99a8(mdo): thags su ma btags dkra' shis yang dang drug/ nye ba'i rin cen lham mchog dpag tshad brgya 'gro bdun// yo byad mkho ba de dag nye bar longs spyod rkyen// 'phags pa myi 'pham dga' ldan chos kyi 'khor lo
99a9(mdo): rje// bdud bzhi btul zhing kun las rgyal ba 'gro ba'i gtso// nor kyi 'khor lo rje ltar nyon mongs ldan ma lags// 'byung ba gsum na rgyal por brjod dgu dper myi bzod// rin cen mchog mnga' bdun
99b1(mdo): las 'khor lo rin cen phul// byang chub 'tshang rgyar gzhol ba'i dge chos 'khor lo ste// nam mkha' mtha' sa gtugs phyogs rnams yongs la dbang sgyur bas// gling bzhi dbang byed gser gi 'khor lo dper myi
99b2(mdo): bzod// min cem glang por mnga' ba mnyam myed theg pa cig/ gti mug mdongs pas mnams na zad dgur rtog pa'i rgyu// theg pa de la rigs bzhi skyes bu brtan par gzhog/ glang po cang shes thal dkar dam pa dper
99b3(mdo): kyi bzod// rin cher rta por so sor yang dag rig pa mnga'// 'gro ba skal yod thogs myed pa'i gnas su spel// 'grod dka'i chos lam bgrod la mthu che mgyogs pa ste// rta mchog dkar po mgyogs de dper
99b4(mdo): myi bzod// rin can btsun mo'i mchog tu khyod la dpral yangaste// yid du 'od dgu'i bde ba ma lus 'phral du bsgrub// mas can kun la byang chub dam pa'i bde ba stob// bud myed
99b5(mdo): rin chen yon tan bgrangs pa dper myi bzod// rin cen nor/ bu dam pa sna tshogs 'od mnga' ste// skad cig yud kyis 'dzi/ garten rgya mtsho kun tu snang // de la reg pas 'gro ba sems kyi
99b6(mdo): snang ba // na ldan nur brgyad mom nyams pa yang / sa kyis bdag rgyu rgyas kyi spya / na ga nga po ga
99b7(mdo): rnams sog pas sum ma du stong // dpag ca yos sug gter mayong dper kyi 'od// rin chen ldan por spyod la byin nas mtshogs pa ste// ci kyi zhid de dang dag sa 'as
99b8(mdo): na su // rjen du kyir la kyi shes 2// //

101a1(mdo): bsdams pa srad kyi rnam pa ste// rtag tu myi skam yul ga chang zhing rnam par marjes// kar skyes nas byung dus tshod yul dang tshul sbyor te// mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i tshe na rdo rje'i gdan du sus// me tog su
101a2(mdo): tig gser gi ze ba bzang dang ldan// sdug ma mnyen 'jam rin sems sa ma kar bas byas// rin chen shes sdong gsal zhing 'jas bdag pas ma zhing // yus mu sar gal kha bsil dga' grib dang ldan// shinam tu babang lem/
101a3(mdo): kun gyis bsngags shing brjod pa'i gnas// bsod nams rgyas pa'i 'bras bu mdog sdug ro zhim ldan// 'od gzer rnam pa sna tshogs de las kun tu 'gro// yid ma smon lam dngos po 'bras bur mngon gyu rad kyang // 'jig
101a4(mdo): rten yid dang sbyor zhing gang ka'i lhar myi skye// nges par klu shing ma yi na khyod kyi yon tan tshogs// sdug bsngal nad kyis gzer ba kun la sman du 'gyur// skye bo bde bas phongs pa bsod nams yid
101a5(mdo): bzhin thob// ci las cir sprul mngon par 'tshang rgya'i shin tu bsta// na// dpal gnas bsam gyis myi khyab rin cen mdzes// mchod rten// dbu la bsdams pa khri 'phang stegs kyi gzhi// bar rim mtho zhing
101a6(mdo): legs drung bsngags pas brjod du 'os// rin chen them smras mnyam myed yid du 'ong dang ldan phreng ba khor yug mchod rten rkyen tu 'byor da cing mdzes// 'bang mthong zur phyind mdog 'tsher 'od kyis rab
101a7(mdo): tu gsal// bum pa skyon myed dbyis legs shin tu brjod par grub// 'od 'phro 'jig rten bsam pa'i mos pa rgya che bskyed// pu ku bur phyin mkhos sdug yon tan 'phags dang ldan// srog shing dpe legs rtsa ba shin tu
101a8(mdo): btAn pa la// gdugs kyi 'phreng ba bzang bzhi legs par bres dang ldan// steng gi char khab yangs pa gnas la sIn lhur lding // sku gdung dbyibs bcas kun gyis rim gror mchod cing bkur// gzhi rten stegs
101a9(mdo): bu rin chen rdo rje mchog las blangs// khri 'phang rin chen seng ge dpal mchog rgyu las bsgrubs// ngos bzhi bem skas rin cen 'gro ba sdang rab byed// 'phreng ba 'gab 'khor rin chen 'jig rten rgyal bas byas//
101b1(mdo): dub pa rgyas pa yid bzhin rin cen 'od las grub// steng gi pu shu rin cen dpe' myed bsam myi khyab// dbus kyi srog shing brtan gzer dpal 'bar 'grubs// gdugs phreng rnam par bsngags pa kun tu khyab
101b2(mdo): pabar snang // char khas bla lding rin chen nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan mchog/ yan lag thams cad de ltar lha ran cen// rang 'byung ba zos bcos ma yin yon tan rmad kyi tshogs// de na bde gshegs ring bsrel rdzu 'phrul che
101b3(mdo): bzhugs pa// bdag nyid che ldan legs pa'i tshogs kyi mthu mnga' bas// bar bar rnam dag gsal ba'i 'od gser mang po 'gyed// 'jig rten gsum gyis sros yun dag rab tu sel// / mchod rten res myin
101b4(mdo): bsam yas dbyibs nyid mkhyend pa yin// don gyi dam par chos nyid bkur sting dbu la bsnams// chos nyid gzugs myed sprul pa mchod rten dbyibs su bsgyur// spror myed dngos las 'dul ba'i/
101b5(mdo): dbang du spros te bstan// dge bcu lus kyi lam ni nang gi stegs shur gyurang // skyon myed yang dag 'dod ma' dge drang rnam par rma/ pa// theg pa gsum po khri 'bang rim pa la bur snang // rnam
101b6(mdo): par gsum gyi stobs bcas byang chub rten kyang myed// rnam par brgyad po ngos kyi thangam smras su bcas// bsgribs pa kun las yang byed 'jig rten 'da' bar 'grod// chos de yang lag bcu gnyis 'gab
101b7(mdo): kyi 'breng bar byas// chos kyi 'khor lo bar chad skabs myed rgyun tu 'khod// chos dbyings spod myed rum pa zlum po'i tshul du snang // yang dag gnyis su myed pas yid bzhin kun 'byung rgya// pu shu mu ba'i tshad myed
101b8(mdo): byed brlab so dam pa ste// gzugs myed brjod 'das gzugs dang tshig tu sprul pa yid// srog zhing brtan btsugs rje kyi sgong lam chen po'i d+han// mi rab dag bcas legs pa'i byar grub gzhan sdi brtan/
101b9(mdo): thugs rje chen mo'i gdugs kyo rim par 'gebs pas na// 'gro ba kun yi nyi ma myed pas khyab par sbyong // zag myed chos mchog rar 'ab bzang de tha lding phul macings grol mabar gnyis myed pas bla phyed byed pa
102a1(mdo): gnas// dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa sku gdung rul sprul te// 'jig rten mun pa 'od snang mkhyend pa yangs pas bsal// skyes gnas bzhi por skye ba'i 'gro ba thams cad la// khyod nyid chos kyi rnga
102a2(mdo): mdzad mchod rten tshul 'gyur bas// 'phags pa'i rmad chos kun kyang rdzogs par yongs bsdus te// sprul cing mtshan mar bsnams la gus par phyag kyang 'tshal// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i le'u ste drug pa'o//
102a3(mdo): nam mkha' yan las char bab nyi ma'ang shar gyur na// 'ja' dang mkha' nyes mtshon bzang sna tshogs 'phel ba snang // spu sdug mdzes snyam de la dga' zhing rtog pa 'byung // na daM ka yams kyi ltas snyam 'jigs shing dogs pa 'ang
102a4(mdo): skyes// du rim spel ba bsrings na snga zhing mdzes par snang // ba/ snyan na bltar yod tsam las zhe ste gzung du myed// shes rab ldan pa das mthong na rang bzhin nges par rtogs// byis pa glen pa rnams ni de
102a5(mdo): la rmongs shing zhe na/ khyod kyi thugs rje 'jig rten snod gyur da ldan pa na// 'das byas chos kyis rol cing sna tshogs ston mdzad pa// de dag yo/ na tan mchog snyam dga' zhing mos pa'ang 'byung // bdud ris stongs/
102a6(mdo): bar sgrub snyam 'jigs shing dogs pa 'ang skye// rkyen 'dus gzhan dbang byung ba rnam par dgra gsal ba// rigs pas gtan la phab na dngos myed sgyu ma bzhin// ye shes mchog gi spyan gyis chos kun 'ja 'a drang gzigs byis
102a7(mdo): bamyi shes rmongs kyang the tsom btsal cing gcad// thogs myed mkhyend bsal de 'dra' phul mnga' ba// 'ang dang mkha'i tshul las dper bla bstod mnyam na// chos kun 'ja 'drar stonang pas sems can sgrol gyis lhag// 'dra ba
102a8(mdo): dper brang dpe zla myed pas khyod la bskyod// 'ang dpapa'a'i dpe' ste// bdun pa'o// / nam mkha' stong pa char sprir spur sdug tshogs 'chas na// 'brug sla brjid grag klog gi 'breng ba mang po
102a9(mdo): ro gcig char zhus rab 'bring tha mo'i shing rtsi skyed// rdul 'dul dgon pa kun kyang mdog sdug rdul myi ldang // rang bzhin stong la yon tan spen gi tshogs 'chas pa// chos kyi 'brug sgra spobs pa'i klog 'phreng myur ba snyom//
102b1(mdo): reg pa gcig las byang chub gar 'os rim par bkod// nyon mongs dgon pa'i rdul mnan rnam byang nyes kyi snang // yon tan rlabs chen 'jig rten kun las 'phags pa'i sprin// 'gro ba sna tshogs dbang po'i rjes su mthun ya dzad cing /
102b2(mdo): dus gsum chos mkhyen dbyings kyis ye shes dag skyed pa// skye bo rin can rgya mtshor sgyur la phyag kyang 'tshal// / yon tan sprin gi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / kha ba zhu 'phang ser ba dus
102b3(mdo): dus 'bab pa ni// ri ka'i sa rdo rjerjem po rang rong mnyam snyom pa// g.ya brag g.yag 'dren nag po grangs kyi tshogs su byas// chu'i klung bskyed thab dkon gdung yul du 'gyur// de bzhin mthu chen bskyed khyed kha dang ser bab ste/
102b4(mdo): ngargyal snyems pas mtho ba'i rtse mo rnal du mnyams// nag po bdud kyi phyogs kyang byang chub gangs su bskyed// rigs pa'i chu bskyed 'gro ba'i bsod nams zhing du 'gyur// mthu stobs tshad myed che ba'i kha ba ser bab pa// ba
102b5(mdo): zhing rgyal gyis thu ba myed med kyi mthus 'dul zhing // 'gro ba rigs dma' kun la 'phags pa'i brjid kyis bstabs// brnyas gnas/ mchod pa'i sa ru sbyar la phyag rgya // / rnam par thar po'o//
102b6(mdo): gangs bskyed pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / gser gyi ri bo 'phags pa bdun rim 'khor ba dang // yan lag pa rgyad ldan chu bo rim bar 'khyil bdag/ ri dang chu rnams spyi mtshan
102b7(mdo): bskum na 'dra mod kyi// so sor bsngos na myi 'dra khyad par rim pa yang // de bzhin khyod kyi byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams dang // 'phags lam rnam par dag pa yan lag brgyad po rnams// de dag spyir brjod byang chub phyogs su
102b8(mdo): 'dra ba ste// gzhan gyi spyod dang phyi mnyam khyar zhugs rnam pa yang // ri bo dus 'dzin mdangs 'bar nye bar ga na b+ha ni// ros bzhi dri myed gsal bar phyogs rnams kun tu snang // lun stug mdzes pa'i yon tan brjod pa gang yA
102b9(mdo): grags// phyi nang gdags sribs par gyi skar mtho legs dang ldan// dran pa nye gzhag rnam par byang ba'i tshul brtags na// lus 'di myi gtsang dngos kyang chos sku gtsang ma'i rten// dngos nyid myi rtag lags kyang dkon mchog/
103a1(mdo): gdung sob brtag/ kun rdzob don dam rnam pa du mar thugs su chud// chos dran nye bar gzhag bde dang sdug bsngal gnyis myin la// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rang bzhin rnam pa mkhyed// nam na ci tshor sems
103a2(mdo): can thug rje gzung bzhin tshor// bdag dang gzhan gyi nyon mongs sna tshogs yongs su spang // sems kyi dran pa nye ra gzhag yang dag tshul brtan pas// 'gro ba kun kyi phyi nang dmyigs sems yongs su mkhyen da// thugs rje chen
103a3(mdo): po tshul bzhin kun la so sor skye// 'on kyang des kyi gnas bye brag 'byed myi mnga'// chos kyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pas dngos po rnams// stong nyid chos kyi dbyings dang myi gnyis thugs chud pas rnam pa thams cad ma lus mkhyend
103a4(mdo): pas rtog pa myed// sems can kun don mdzad kyang chos nyid mtshams myi 'da'// sngon gyi smon lam mthu ldan dran pa nye gzhag bzhis// log pa rnam bzhi ngan lta kun ni yongs su sbyangs// rnam rtog mtshan mar
103a5(mdo): 'dzind pa ma lus btsal cing bor// spyod pa rgya chen sna tshogs chub// bar yongs su dag/ khyod kyi yon tan tshogs chen mnga' ba de dag la// 'thun pa'i tshul las dran te dper blang bston snyam na// myi mnyam
103a6(mdo): mnyam pa dpe las 'das pas brjod du myed// 'on kyang nam gyis pa rtags pa'i dper blang 'ol tsam bstod// gshol 'dzin ri bo tshul la sa mya du brtags pa/ skyon myed dbyibs legs mdzes pa mthong dgus
103a7(mdo): bsngags par grags// bye brag rnam pa phyogs bzhi kun nas rgyas par bres// skyel dang 'bying gi gnod pa kun spod tshul du gnas// yang dag spong ba mying dang yon tan 'thun pa ste// myi dge go bkag dge chos spel bas
103a8(mdo): kun tu bzung // tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab rnam grol yongs su rdzogs// nab 'byor da dam pa rtag tu 'khrul myed sgrib myi 'tshal// myi dge 'byung ba ma skyes myi 'gag tshul mkhyen pas// 'dod chags khor 'phro gti mug
103a9(mdo): dri ma yongs su bsal// dus gsum ma lus mnyam pa nyid du mngon gsum phyir// 'das dpa ma 'ongs da ltar byung la ye shes 'jug/ dge chos ma skyes bskyed pa'i don tu thugs bskyed pas// yang dag bsgrub pa'i dge/

103b4(mdo): nga ra ba das sa// 'thun pa'i rnam sa sa rnas te dper srung so/ denas mad+ma/ kyisanyas mnyam par rjesas 'das pasu brjod pa da/ 'on kyang da kris brtags pa'i dper blang 'os ma mthor/
103b5(mdo): seng ldeng ri lo phyogs bzhi nar du ba jos dang gnyis// spro dang bya ru lta ba'i ngos gnyis bgrangs par bani// seng ldeng sdong rings na/ kas stug kyang bzang yid du 'ong // lo ya grI ba chen gdung ba stong/
103b6(mdo): pa'i mdab ma yang // rdzu 'phrul ting bani mas dang 'artsor 'grus 'bar deng gnyis// sems dang spyod pa 'du byed spong dang ldan par ba'i// byang chub sems bsams dge ldan mos pa'i rkang pa yang // myi dge tshos sring 'artson/
103b7(mdo): ma na gas chen ma sems tu 'phrul rkang pa nga // khabs palas nas 'di myed pa'i na A sa// nu 'phrul chos rnams sang dag zugs ca rdzogs pasred pas/
103b8(mdo): gshegs lags bzhin ba na skye g+sa / gas dgas sa rnams sa sa da 'i ta ngas khye na tu sa kyi krugs
103b9(mdo): sa rnams mangs su 'gas/ byung ba micig gis bdag zhigs mas sabs pa bslas// byam pa rje rlom pa byed bani// de dag su 'drus na mi can 'gan pa dang gyul /
104a1(mdo): gtan ting 'dzin mnyam gzhag mang po kun la rol// lus dang sems kyi bag yangs yon tan chen po bsnyes// khyod kyi yon tan tshogs chen mnga' ba de dag la// thun pa'i tshul las dras te dper blar bston ste
104a2(mdo): na// myi mnyam mnyam pa dpe las 'das pas brjod du myed// 'on kyang nan kyis brtags pa'i dper slar 'ol tsam bstod// mdzes snad ri bo ngos bzhi shar nub blta dga' dang // lho byang gnyis kyang ngos kyis bya bas
104a3(mdo): tha dad de// mthong dga'i tshal du 'dra bas khyed myed bzhi po ni// seng ldeng ri bo'i sdong rings grib kyis sems dang lnga// dbang po lnga mnga' dang dang brtson 'grus 'bar ba gnyis// dran dang ting 'dzin shes rab gsal bas
104a4(mdo): rnam pa lnga// dad pas byang chub spyod bsdus de nyid brtson pas ba sbubs// dran pa'i dbang pos legs pa de dag chud ma bstsal// ting 'dzin dbang pos chos rab de dag rtse gcig bzung // shes rab dbang /
104a5(mdo): pos de dag shin tu rtogs par mkhyend// dbang po de dag ldan zhi// de rjes su mabrel bas na// sems can kun gyi don gnyer bde phan pa// sbubs srad du// dbang po lnga rnams de 'dra yon tan 'phags pa
104a6(mdo): mnga'// 'jig rten ma btang 'jig rten 'das pa'i dbang pos rol phal gis myi 'dus gzhan gis yongs su dgri myi 'tshal// pha rol da po'i dmyigs mkhar myi zad byang chub sems myi bstod// dbang po lnga
104a7(mdo): mthus dus gsum srid pa thams cad du// gzhan gi rnyog bsal rang gi tri ma rnam par spangs// khyod kyi yon tan tshogs chen mnga' ba de dag la// 'thun pa'i tshul las dras te dper blang bstod snyam na// myi mnyam mnyam pa
104a8(mdo): dpe las 'das pa rjod du myed// 'on kyang nan gyis brtags pa'i dper blang 'ol tsam bstod// rta rna ri bo yan lag ngos bzhi bgrangs pa dang // seng ldeng ri bo sdong rings grib kyis slebs dang lnga// gzer mkhrang rna bzhin
104a9(mdo): kyi nyan yun tu brtan pa ste// dbyibs legs sra ba'i yon tan 'chang bas rtse byi rnyil// de bzhir khyod la stobs mchog lnga po mnga' ba ni// dad pa'i stobs dang brtson 'grus dam pa brtan pas gnyis// dran pa'i stobs
104b1(mdo): rang ting nge 'dzin nga mchog gi stobs dang bzhi// shes rab gsal ba log myed stobs kyi mchog gis lnga// dad pa'i stobs parar bdud kyi dpung gis sku byi nus// brtson 'grus stobs mnga' rtul la gzhan gyis bskyed kyi su/
104b2(mdo): dran pa'i stobs yanga' nyon mongs chos kyis par myi chod// ting 'dzin stobs mnga' rnal 'byor spyod kyis gzhan mye 'khrugs// shes rab stobs mnga' mkhas pa'i yul byung thub pa byed// stobs mchog lnga po de dag rdzogs par
104b3(mdo): mngal bas ni// log pa'i phyogs kyis mye 'phrogs pa nad dgu rapal 'phongs// lA dpal mye 'jig rten bcas pas bskyab du byed// mye bkyed myadad pagyid pa thams cad chub par mdzad// mdzad dgu don mchis yul gyi
104b4(mdo): nams pas ma gyi 'byung // nam grol stobs rdzogs the com dris yongs su bsal// theg pa gzhan gyis mye 'dus theg pa chen por tan// khyod kyi yon tan tshogs chen mnga' ba de dag la// 'bur
104b5(mdo): ba'i tshul las dras te dper blang bstod snyam na// myi mnyam mnyam ba rapa las 'das pa brjod du myed// 'on kya nan kyis brtags ba'i dper blang rol tsam bstor// mu 'dzind ri bo mu ni spyi mtshan
104b6(mdo): myong du brjod// 'dzin ni yan lag rnam pa so so bgrang ba'i brda// ngos bzhi de las gcig phyung spyir btang ngos gsum po// rnam btud steng bsnan ba stobs te cha bgrangs bdun du 'gyur// rnam btud de'i spro mthon
104b7(mdo): rtse mo du ma yang // ri rab dbus nas skyes la kun gyis gus par btud// rin cen gser gi r-i yang bsnyen bkur gus byed na// gling bzhi gzhan gi ri rnams myu gus gang zhig 'byung // sa 'dzin ri bo logs cig phyos
104b8(mdo): gcig ngos byung ba// gser gi ri bo thams cad las dang mdog 'thun pas// sa'i sgra dang spur te skye mtshan myang du bya// lhag sa 'dzin kyi skar sbyar yan lag don tu bstan// byang chub yan lag bdun ni dran dang chos
104b9(mdo): 'byed gnyis// brtson 'grus dga' ba ting nge 'dzin dam pas drug/ btang bsnyoms der gtogs byang chub yan lag de ltar bdun// 'di ni rnam pa kun tu spyad pa'i mthu yang yang // tshul khrims ting 'dzind rnam
105a1(mdo): grol phung po dang // rnam thar grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po rnams// byang chub dgongs pa nas yang nyams par bya 'gyur bas// chos kun rnam par 'byed pa shugs su chud pas brnyes// sems can yos/
105a2(mdo): su sbyi par mngang la sbyor myi 'gyur// chos kyi dga' la rnam dag dgyes pas rnam par rol// dga' ba de'i don la 'gro ba thams cad 'jog cing stobs// ting 'dzin myi g.yo gcig bzhugs spyod pa sna tshogs mdzad// bkye
105a3(mdo): ba'i rnam pa ma lus bgyis pa'i nyid du gyurang // rnam grol snying po 'phags pas bsngags pa grub cing rdzogs// sku gsum mtshan ldan pa de bshegs che ba nyid du gyur // chos kyi long spyod rdzogs pa'i sgyid la rnam par
105a4(mdo): rol// khyed kyi yon tan tshogs chen mnga' ba de dag la// 'thun pa 'i tshul dris dper blang bstod pa ni// mya mnyam mnyam pa dpe las 'das pas brjod du myed// 'on kyang nan kyis brtags pa'i dper
105a5(mdo): blang snyad kyis bstod// gser ri de dag phrag na chu mchog yon tan/ can// yan lag brgyad dang ldan par mtshungs pa'i legs brjod// ra// grang ste bsil bas tsha ba'i gdung ba yongs su sel/
105a6(mdo): skom pas nyen pa ngoms shing bde bas tshim par byed// yangs te 'jug pa ga dang rtsar mgyogs bde ba'i rgyu// yon tan lngas reg lus kyi dbang po dga' ba'i rkyen// zhim pa'i ro mchog kha bsnying nga ba gang yang
105a7(mdo): myed// ro zhim de myangs lce'i dbang po dga' zhing bde// 'jam la mnyen mas 'gengs dang rtsub po'i dngos myi 'byung // mdangs bzang sa le mdog bzang phral ba'i rgyur yang 'gyur// dang bas gtsang zhing mdog ngan rnyog
105a8(mdo): pa de la myed// bltas te mthong na myig gi dbang po dga' ba'i rgyu// dri ram mchis gtsang dang zhi bar gad bras na// bsnams te bsum na sna'i dbang po dga' zhing 'dag/ mgul bar myi thogs yon tan gong ma ma
105a9(mdo): po'i rgyu// yan lag 'di dran btung na spro zhing yi ga 'bye// 'thungs dug dang nyam nga gnod pa'i nad myi 'gyur// rnam pa kun tu lus la bde ba sna tshogs skyed// 'di 'dra'i don zos rna ba'i dbang po dga' zhing 'dag/
105b1(mdo): dbang po gzhan kun yid kyi dbang du mgu zhing rangs// 'phags pa'i sa rdo shing rtsi nags tshal gzhan kun kyang // kha rog mangs ldan ro mchog gda' bas rgyas par nus// sems can khams rnams gang gis 'thungs te
105b2(mdo): myong 'gyur ba// dbang po thams cad sdang bas gsal zhing bde bar 'gyur// khyod la 'phags lam yan lag brgyad ldan mnga' bas na// yang dag lta bas mtha' gnyis bro bsul snyoms par gzigs// rtog pa'i/
105b3(mdo): gdung bsngal srel bas spros pa tshim zhing ngoms// de bzhin nyid bstad du sems dga' ba'i chog kyang bskyed// yang dag rtogs pas yid kyi las ran gsum spang ba shing // mnyam dang myi mnyam rtogs pa yongs pa
105b4(mdo): phyir myi 'byung // lta ba'i dngos po kun bsas sgrib pa byang sra ste// reg na lus kyi skyor byang thams cad la khyedang du mgyogs// yang dag ngag gcig bdag dang gzhan la gnod pa myed// chos gang brjod kyang bkra dan
105b5(mdo): rim snyoms dam pa gsung // tshig snya dang sgra myi rtsub yid 'ong dmyi b+h+yo// bden legs smras mthus ma nod brjod na sde yang 'ang ka/ yang dag las mtha' nyon mongs zhi ba'i rgyur yang 'jug/
105b6(mdo): dge mngon mdzad kyang bcog cing stong par rab tu mkhyed// mnyen de/ las spyod gnod dpa'ache ba'irgyu myi mdzad// dge 'angs spyod rgyu reg dga' zhi bo yid du 'ong // yang dag 'tsho ba nyon mongs rnam pa kun
105b7(mdo): grogs// 'tsho ba dag par 'dud cing tshis don rdzogs par yadzang// rang bzhin dang pas gyod lam nus 'angs rnyog m+b+ha snang // mamaud dga' sa 'tshal bltas dbyig gi dbang po 'das// yang dag rtsol ba dge dag
105b8(mdo): sangs su rgyas bkye bar// da tan bsgrubapa spromams cad mkhyen da pa li ru bcud// sdig dri dbyang rtsol dgu dge ba'i phyogs su 'gyur// rdul khrims spong tshor rig pa sna'i da yo dka'// yang dag dran par
105b9(mdo): rol phyid de pa drug dang 'dra// chad byed bzhi nam nyon mongs 'dun las yongs su 'dar// yun ring dus nas yang dag chub par bsgoms pas na// 'gon po khyod kyi dgongs pa nam yang nyam mye gad la/ ma lnga/
106a1(mdo): thogs myed dbang po zil kyis mnon pas// yang dag dran na phal kun 'dun cing dad pas 'du// yang dag ting nge 'dzin log pa spangs la snyoms zhugs pas// chos kun rnam dag thams cad mkhyend du
106a2(mdo): mngon sangs rgyas// yan lag de rgyus nyon mongs thams cad rnam par bstsal// 'khor ba'i gdug spangs khyab cing snyoms pas bde bar mdzad// chos 'di bshad zos rna ba'i dbang po dga' zhing 'dag/ rnam shes
106a3(mdo): kun 'dag ye shes mchog bzhi thob par 'gyur// phyi rol yul kun sangs rgyas zhing du yongs sbyangs pas// dga' bde mchog gnas dag pa rin cen shing dang ldan// sems can snod gyur byang chub myug gu mang skye bas
106a4(mdo): bde gshegs lo tog rgyal ba grangs myed mngon sangs rgyas// khyod la rnam dag byang chub phyogs kyi chos mnga' ba// 'jig rten khams na rmad rung btsal dka' phal la myed// nyan thos rang rgyal kun kyang /
106a5(mdo): cha shas dper myi bzod// 'jig rten gsum po gzhan lta smos su// ka la rung // bde bshegs pasras bcas rgyu gyur byang chub phyogs ma// nga' ba// bzlas shing dad pa phyir skye brtags shing ngo mtshar che//
106a6(mdo): de 'dra gzhal yas chos kyis grub pa'i yon tan dbyings// bsam sa shing ngoms dka' legs dgu tshogs la phyag kyang 'tshal// / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi le'u ste bcu pa'o//
106a7(mdo): ri rab drung gi bar rim gru bzhi tha ma la// lho byang shar nub phyogs su lta ba'i ngos yod la// gzhan la tha dad phyogs kyi mtshan mar sdar mod kyi// bdag ni 'di'i phyogs snyam de la sems pa myed// khyod la so so
106a8(mdo): yang dag mkhyend pa bzhi mnga' ba// gzhan la tha dad bye brag rnam par gsal 'byed cing // don chen grangs myed rang rang rkyen bzhin kun thob kyang // mkhyend po'i rang bzhin mtshan nyid gcig cing rtog pa myed//
106a9(mdo): de la gtang sgrub 'du shes sna tshogs myi mnga' yang // dus gsum chos dang don rnams skad cig gcig gis rig gsung gcig yan lag grangs myed rda' skad kun tu 'phro// rdul phran cig brjod spobs pa bskal
106b1(mdo): ba'i mthar myi zad// don dang chos rtogs rang bzhin bstan la 'khrul myi mnga'// nges pa'i tshig mkhyend gang bstan myi gsal thogs pa myed// spobs pa che mnga' ci spor rgya bskyed pas ma 'tshal// dpag yas yang dag/
106b2(mdo): rig mnga' khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// bang rim gong ma rnam gsum ros bzhir 'khor ba ni// phyir bsdoms bcu gnyis yod pa kun kyang ri rab 'dzin// klu dang 'gro ba mang gnas gtogs dkyil gzhan du dka'// 'on
106b3(mdo): kyang grangs dang rim pa spyi tsam brjod par bya// khyod la dus gsum mnyam 'dug cad kyi gzungs mnga' ba// mkhyend pa'i yon tan myi nyan mthu can bcu gnyis 'grangs// spos te rgyas par brjod na bskal bar zad
106b4(mdo): mye shes// don mdzad khyod las mdo tsam de dag byeng du brjod/ mngon par dbang bskur gzungs dang ye shes ldan pa dang // nam dag sgra dbyangs myi zad mdzod du grags par bzhi// mtha' yas kun tu
106b5(mdo): 'khyil dang rgya mtsho'i sgra dbyangs dang // ma chags skor 'jug pad// mo'i rgyun tu gzungs mchog brgyad// so so yang dag mkhyen la la drug dang sangs rgyas rgyan// kha dog mtha' yangs sangs rgyas
106b6(mdo): yon tan sgrub pa dang // de rnams bcu gnyis ye shes ri rab rten du gnas// 'gro bamang po'i gzus kyi gcol la phyag kyang 'tshal/ ri rab lhun po 'i ngos phyir ltas pa// kun kyang rin cen dbang gi
106b7(mdo): mthu dang rnam par ldan// ngos bzhi gser rdul shel dang be du rA yin te// phyogs bzhin byu dku' ri yi mtshon bzhin snang // phyogs mtshams grwa bzhi nur dod skams phyin dpe legs pa// gleng bzhi so sor nyin mtshan
106b8(mdo): tshong 'dzin dbang yang sbyar// 'og phyogs brtan zhing spyi bo mnyen 'jam dga' bde ba// lha sde mang por 'du zhing dgyes par gnas kyi gzhi// de bzhin khyod kyi dbang bcu mngon mdzad phyir ston pa// kun kyang rin cen
106b9(mdo): rabang mchog kar yang thogs pa myed// dbang gi yon tan mthu yang rnam pa du ma ste// gang la ci'i rigs de'i tshul du so sor sbyar// 'khrul myed thabs dang ldan pas mdzad dku dmyigs su phebs// 'gro ba bdaka /
107a1(mdo): smod pa yid bzhin rangs pa thob// btar zhing dga' ba de'i spyod pas kun tu phan 'dogs la// sdug bsngal smang dgu tu phan 'dags so// sdug bsngal spong dgu khyod kyi skyabs su 'dod par mos dbang bcu de
107a2(mdo): dag so so 'i yon tan dmyigs brjod na// tshe la mnga' bas tshad myed bskal par byin gyis rlob// sems la mnga' bas brjod 'das ting nge 'dzin kun la 'jug/ yo byad mnga' bas grangs myed 'jig rten bkod pa sgrub
107a3(mdo): las la mnga' bas dus tshul 'thun par rnam smin ston skye la mnga' bas 'jig rten kun tu rang dbang 'byung // mos pa mnga' bas chos dbyings rgyal bar gzigs// smon lam mnga' bas zhing dus gar bzhed mngon chad
107a4(mdo): rgya// rdzu 'phrul mnga' bas 'jig rten kun tu rnam par 'phrul/ chos la mnga' bas chos sgo mtha' dang dbus myed stong // ye shes sa dnga' bas sangs rgyas chos rnams mngon tu gyur// dbang bcu'i
107a5(mdo): mchog dang ldan la phyag kyang 'tshal// ri bo de'i ngos bcu nang du lta/ sa pa yang // rgyu ni lha rdzas rin cen bzhi las grub pa yin// lhun stug mkhrang ba'i stobs ni dpe zla re la myed// brtan mchog
107a6(mdo): sra bo'i phul la cis kyang g.yos myi srid// khyod la nang nas mkhyen po'i stobs bcu mnga' bo ni// bla myed dam pa'i ye shes rnam dag bzhi las byung // bsgoms pa'i tshogs kyis 'phags te shes pa kun las 'das
107a7(mdo): blo mchog brtan pa'i stobs la sgrib dgus 'ge bas myi nus// nyan thos rang rgyal ba la la myed pa'i stobs bcu po// gnas dang gnas myin rig pa'i stobs mchog mnga' bas na// gnas yod 'thad dang gnas myed skab
107a8(mdo): byin yang dag mkhye nad // nam mkha' mtha' yas gtugs par gar yang thugs su chud// las kyi rnam sbyin rig pa'i stobs mchog mnga' bas na// dus gsum las kyi rgyu gnas rnam par spyod pa mkhyend// mos
107a9(mdo): pa sna tshogs rig pa'i stobs mchog mnga' ba na// cig nas gar mos rab 'bring tha ma kun tu mkhyend// sna tshogs rnams rig pa'i stobs mchog mnga' bas na// 'du byed rnam gsum 'byung lam gang gis spyod
107b1(mdo): ba mkhyend// dbang po sna tshogs ri ba'i stobs mchog mnga' bas na// rab 'bring tha ma'i dbang po gang las cir 'gyur mkhye nang // kun tu 'gro ba'i lam rig stobs mchog mnga' bar na// lam gau rnam pa gang gis
107b2(mdo): cir 'byung mkhyend // ting 'dzin sngo 'gro ldang rig stobs mchog mngal bas na// kun nas nyon mongs rnam dag gang gis 'thob pa mkhyen// sngon gi gnas dgongs rig pa'i stobs mchog mnga' bas na// bdag dang
107b3(mdo): gzhan gi sngon tshe mthar gtug mkhyen// mngon mdzad 'phrul kyai s+yan rig stobs mchog mnga' bas na// nam mtha'i mtha' gtugs chos rnams thams cad ma lus gzigs// mngon mdzad zag pa zad rig sngon
107b4(mdo): gau stobs mchog mnga' bas ni// bag chags mtshams sbyor kun bcom chos sku rab brnyes mkhyen// stobs bcu'i dbyig dang ldan pas gzigs mnga' mthu'i phul// legs kyi lhun stug brtan pa mchog la
107b5(mdo): phyag kyang 'tshal// ra~M bar zla bzhi rtse mo shin tu mtho gnas la/ gnod sbyin dpa' bo lag nardo rje'i sde bzhi gnas// gdul da// 'o c-is myi thub pa dam sde'i 'jigs khas// rdzu 'phrul dbang
107b6(mdo): thob cing gzi pa brjid mchog kyang 'bar// khyod kyi ye shes pa/ zhi po phul 'byung rtse mo la// mya gajigs sde bzhi'i spobs pa'o/ mtshon can gnas// bdud dang bcas kyis dgra rnams rgol ba'i
107b7(mdo): sde 'jig ma khas// kun las rnam par rgyal ba'i yon tan mchog kyang 'bar// zag pa ma lus thams cad zad par thugs chud de// bar chad chos rnams gzhan du myi 'gyur lung ston cing // 'byung ba'i la
107b8(mdo): rnams phun sum tshogs 'gyur myi bsnyengs pas// mngon par sangs rgyas khyu mchog seng ge'i ngado sgrog/ dbang po gdul dka' phyi 'dra dngos la khyod zhugs pas// gnod sbyin snga dang rdo rje mtshod kyang dper gyi
107b9(mdo): zod// myi 'jigs bzhi mthus dogs myed bde dgyes mchog kyang brnyes// de 'dra'i rmad chos sde bzhi mnga' la phyag kyang 'tshal// dbang sgyur gyi chos phun sum gyi le'u ste// bcu gcig pa'o//
108a1(mdo): nam mkhal yan la ces kyang chags shing gos pa myed// rnam pa gang dang 'grogs kyang myi 'dre dben pa'i tshul// rgya che yangs pa'i mtha' ma thug myed kun tu khyab// dngos po 'byung gu'i go 'byed yid bzhin mthar
108a2(mdo): sgo phye// khyod kyi chos sku bag chags ma lus kun byang bas// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend kyang gzung dang 'dzin gyis dben// chos dbyings rnam dag mtha' gzhan mkhyend pas kun tu khyab// yon tan rdzu 'phrul go 'byed
108a3(mdo): sems can mtha' sgo gtod// skyon myed rnam par gsal ba dpag dka' chos kyi sku// rdul bral nam mkha'i tshul las dper blangs bstod bsngags kyang // gang zag chos la bdag myed yang dag mkhyend kyis lhag
108a4(mdo): 'dra dper blang myed bzhin khyod la bstod// 'gro 'od skye 'jigs ma za' bral chos sku dam pa de// nam mkha' rnam pa myed las dper blang bstod bstod bsngags kyang // yod myed mtha' las 'das te
108a5(mdo): brjod du myed pas lhag/ 'dra ba'i dper zla myed bzhin khyod la bstod// ma yos du mar sprul ston chos sku dam pa de// 'gyur mye/ de nam mkha'i tshul las dper blang bstod bsngags kyang // bskyod
108a6(mdo): bsgyur myi 'tshal sems can don mnga' 'thob kyis lhag/ 'dra ba'i dper blang dpe zla myed bzhin khyod la stod// dpag dka' zab yang sa gting gi chos sku dam pa de// gzhal dka' nam mkha'i tshul
108a7(mdo): las dper blangs bstod pasngags kyang // gang gis de rig chos sku rgyu ru 'gyur gyis lhag/ 'dra ba'i dper blang dpe zla myed bzhin khyod la bstod// mtshan nyid gnyis myed pa'i chos sku dam pa ste// myi gnyis nam mkha'i
108a8(mdo): tshul la dper blangs bstod bsngags kyang // phyi gnyis nyid la gnas kyang grangs myed mkhyend kyis lhag/ 'dra ba'i dper blangs dpe zla myed bzhin khyod la bstod// mnyam byed mnyam pa mnyam nyid chos sku dam pa de/
108a9(mdo): nam mkha' snyoms par gnas las dper blangs bstod bsngags kyang // tshad myed tshogs gnyis yongs dka rang bzhin nyid kyis lpag/ 'dra ba'i dper blang dpe zla myed de bzhin khyod la bstod// chos kyi sku'i le'u ste
108b1(mdo): xxx
108b2(mdo): gu ldan tshung donas 'dos/ 'od na su san kyi'i grol kyi 'byu/ ba po tog yang 'byed// ra mas kyi dbang gis dpa' dasar gyun nus/ sa rgya che kyi
108b3(mdo): bas yid ces 'bus pa'i gdungs// 'byims shing nyid mug ris par 'phel ba'o// 'khor lo ban gyi 'od gzer gsal 'bar mun parnas par mal// nas na nyi la khyims 'beb res pa'i gas med pam// dkan/
108b4(mdo): xxx
108b5(mdo): spyod pa des bskul gti mug 'byung ni 'dod chen chu'o// bstan dang / myi bstan bye brag byed pa'i rtag byed du// dge ba che zhi mthong zhing / byang chub sems kyang 'byed// dge 'a chung chung sleb pa'i dab
108b6(mdo): gas mtho mya dus// smon lam 'bras bu chung kyi zhabs ston pa gzungs// yon tan tshad myed sna tshogs 'od ltar skul 'khor/ dkyil nas ye shes snang bar sgrib pa'i mun kyang sel// gang kr-I/
108b7(mdo): sku'i 'od mthong chos ston ltas yin pas/ myi 'om sems can chos zhus ngoms snyam dad cing spro// nam yang mya ngan myi 'da' longs spyod rdzogs sku de// nyi ma skyed 'bri myed las dper blang bstod bsngags
108b8(mdo): kyang // 'khor bar smon lam mthus bzhugs gzha phyir rtag gis lug/ 'dra ba'i dper blang dpe zla phyed bzhin khyod la bstod// rgyal sras khro bo tshogs mnga' 'khor lding nyer 'tsho ba// nyi ma gzal ska
108b9(mdo): 'khor bcas dper blangs bstod bsngags kyang // 'phrul chen tshogs kun bsam pa yid bzhin ldan pas lhag/ 'dra ba'i dper blang dpe zla myed bzhin khyod la bstod// mgon po'i mthus bskul byang/
109a1(mdo): chub sa nas sar 'bar ba// gnyi shar nyal dgu ldang las dpeng ldang las dper blangs bstod bsngags kyang // sa mchog kun tu 'od gonyi thob par bskul gyis lhag/ 'dra ba'i dper blangs dpe zla
109a2(mdo): myed bzhin khyod la bstod// longs spyod rdzogs sku bstan dang rtog myed pa// nyi ma 'bri bkrol myed las dper blangs bstod bsngags kyang // gnas la 'thun zhing mthong dang myi mthong 'gal gyis lhag/ 'dra ba'i
109a3(mdo): dper blang dpe zla myed bzhin khyod la bstod// dge bya ches mthong byang chub mchog go sems dbye ba// mthor char mye tog 'byed las dper blangs bsdog sngags kyang // 'jigs rten bla ma'i chos kun ston cing stobs lcag/
109a4(mdo): 'dra ba'i dper blangs dpe zla myed bzhin khyod la bstod// dge rtsa chung ngu'i spyod yul myin te ma mthong ba// dma' dmar sngon tu nub las dper blang bsngod sngags kyang // ma mthong ba sgribs kyang thos
109a5(mdo): pas don chen thob kyi lhag/ 'dra ba'i dper blang dper bzhin// byol bstod// kha dog snga tshogs 'od bzang sku la mnga' ba de// tshon stag 'khyims po'i tshul las dper blangs bstod sngags kyang //
109a6(mdo): 'od kyi reg dgu ting 'dzin du ma mthob kyis lhag/ 'dra ba'i dper blang dpe zla myed bzhin khyod la bstod// ye shes mchog bzhi'i bar bas sgrib pa'i mun sel ba// nyi ma mun se la tshul las dpe
109a7(mdo): blangs bstod sngags kyang // phyi nang sgrib dgu ye shes 'od kyis sel bas lhag/ 'dra ba'i dper blang dpe zla myed bzhin khyod la bstod// sku las 'od byung mthong na chos ston lhas 'dzin cing // chos kyi
109a8(mdo): bdud rtsi zhu ba char la dang spo ba// nyes phyims char 'bab lngas las dper blangs bstod sngags kyang // 'od 'byung gnas kyi tshul las chos don rig par rung // bdud bzhi'i myi tshugs chos kyi bdud
109a9(mdo): tshe'i char phab pas byang chub myug gu bde gshegs sdong por skyed sgrub cing // yongs sbyin 'bras bu phan 'dogs 'gro chos lhag/ 'dra ba'i dper blang dpe zla myed bzhin khyod la bstod// nyer bar
109b1(mdo): ma'i zi la du skar ma gzhan brlags kyang // gza chen gzig ldan rnams kyis gzhan myed mngon par snang // gnyi zla gza dang bcas su gang gis mthong 'gyur ba// de la tshe ring bde dga' dge ba'i ltas su bya//
109b2(mdo): de dag rgyu skar bzhin du lam nges myi 'dod yang // dus dang rang gyi chos las 'gal bar myi rgyu ste// 'gyes 'dums mgyogs bul skar mkhan gyis kyis shes par rung // phan dang gnod 'gyur ltas las 'jig
109b3(mdo): rten bag kyang bgyid longs spyod sku'i 'khor mnyan thos myi sdang yang // rdo rje po rigs kho bo gzi ldang mang du gnas// longs spyod 'phrul sku 'khor bcas gang sgrub pa// tshe 'di nyid la 'dod dgur rang dang
109b4(mdo): thob par 'gyur// 'dul ba'i sdom pas bsngags pa'i tshul la myi 'khor kyang // don myed sdig pa'i mtshams su de dag myi 'da' ste// dge dang sdig pa'i rnam sbyin 'bral du mngon bstan pas// nga rgyal rnam
109b5(mdo): par 'dul zhing sdig la bag byed 'jug/ mthu che brtson drag khro bo rnams kyi yon tan de// kun kyang thog ma mngon po dag/ gi mthu las byung // drag dal sna tshogs ci rigs dmyigs su
109b6(mdo): phebs spyod pa// khro bo brjod ldan 'khor du mnga' la phyag kyang 'tshal// longs spyod rdzogs sku'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // zla ba 'od gsal mthur ldan bsil ba'i rang ban
109b7(mdo): can// bdag la 'gyur ba myed kyang gzhan dbang 'gyur snang ste// dkar po yang zhing dag po dmang zhing 'bri// mtshan kyi dus na shar kyang mngon snang nyi ma bzhin// me long chu dkyil rkyen bzhin gzugs bstan
109b8(mdo): rje chung 'byung // byang chub sngon spyod rtags ni ngos la dgrod par snang // mthong dgu mdzod stod lta 'dod myig la rje ltar yang // skar phran mang por 'khor bgyis btsun pa'i rdzing dang ldan// 'khyams ni mtha' rnar
109b9(mdo): dkar tshon mdzes pa khod de mnyam// dkyil nas mthu chen yon gyis lam ston gdung ba sel// nam na zla 'khyims gnyis 'dra char kyi lhas yin pas// rlan skam drang pyid 'gyur snyam kun kyang re zhing stod// sprul
110a1(mdo): sku mkhyen gsal mthu chen khong nas dge byams pa// longs spyod myi 'gyur sku las 'dul dbang ston mdzad de// tshogs gnyis 'gengs dang mya ngan 'da' ba 'ang cig char ston// rnyog lnga mun bab tshe 'ang
110a2(mdo): yon tan rmad du 'bar// sems can snod kyi rkyen bzhin so sor rang gis mthong // spu cig zhung nas byang chub spyod tshul grangs myed snang // mthong thos mchod stod myi ngoms dbang po rnam par dag// 'phags pa nyan
110a3(mdo): thos mchog ldan 'khor gi rmad du btsun// dri myed zla ba'i zhal la rnam dag 'od kyis bskod dkyil na byams pa chen po phan 'dogs 'phag lam mtshom// gang gis 'od gsal mdom tshad bkra shis de mthong ba// nyon
110a4(mdo): mongs sdug bsngal rnam par byang snyam re zhing sdod// chos la nga dbang dgyes dgus mdzad pa'i sprul sku de// snang bsil zla ba'i rgyu la las dper bla bstod sngags kyang // tshad myed byams dang dger
110a5(mdo): ldan ye shes gsal gis lhag/ 'dra ba'i dper blang dpe zlamyed bzhin khyod la bstod// longs spyod rtag pa'i sku las sna tshogs cad 'byung ba// zla ba skye 'bri'i dper blangs bstod
110a6(mdo): bsngags kyang // rnam pa bsam myi khyab pa byin du rlob kyis lhag/ 'dra ba'i dper blang dpe zla myed bzhin khyod la bstod// tshogs 'geng mya na po 'da' la stsogs pa'i rnam sprul pa// zla ba dkar nag skyed 'bris
110a7(mdo): dper blangs bstod bsngags kyang // lha dang phyir 'phel ngan 'gro khams su 'grib pas lug/ 'dra ba'i dper blang dpe zla myed bzhin khyod la bstod// rnyog lnga mur dus yon tan mchog gis bskol mdzad pa// mtshan
110a8(mdo): kyi zla ba nyi bzang las dper blangs bstod bsngags kyang // nyon mongs zil ma nan rnam byang chos chos su bsgyur gyis lhag/ 'dra ba'i dper blang dpe zla myed bzhin khyod la bstod// sems can snod kyi rkyen tu yid
110a9(mdo): bzhin gzugs 'char ba// chu zla gzugs brnyan snang las dper blangs bstod sngags kyang // kong la cis 'dul gzugs kyang chos kyi bston pas lhag// 'dra ba'i dper brang dpe zla myed bzhi ni khyod la
110b1(mdo): bstod // rnyog ljang mun dus yon tan mchog gis sgrol mdzad pa// mtshan gyi zla nya bzang las dper blangs bstod bsngags kyang // nyon mongs zil nan rnam byang chos su bsgyur gis lhag/ 'dra ba'i dper brang dpe zla myed
110b2(mdo): bzhin khyod la bstod// sems cad snod kyi rkyen tu yid bzhin gzugs 'char ba// chu zla gzugs brnyan snang bas dper blangs bstod bsngags kyang // gang la cis 'dul gzugs kyang chos kyi ston pas lhag/ 'dra
110b3(mdo): ba'i dper blangs dpe zla myed bzhin lnga bstod// ba su cig las byang chub spyod pa rnam bstod pa// ri bong gzugs brnyan snang las dper blangs bstod bsngags kyang // dkar thub de 'dra du ma bgrang las 'das kyis
110b4(mdo): lhaga'adra ba'i dper blang dpe zla myed bzhin rdzo bstod// mthong bzos mchod cing ston la dbang po yongs 'dag pa// mchod stod myig la phan las dper blangs bstod bsngags kyang // skal yod dang
110b5(mdo): pa bskyed zhing myig lnga 'thob kyis lhag/ 'dra ba'i dper bla nga/ be zla myed bzhin khyod la bstod// 'phags pa nyan thos 'khor/ babyed rmad du btsun brjid pa// zla ba skar phran bcas las
110b6(mdo): dper blangs bstod bsngags kyang // 'jig rten 'jig rten 'di sa kyi yod tad brjod kyis lhag/ 'dra ba'i dper blang dpe zla myed pa zhing khyod la bstod// dri byed nal bzang yon tan 'od kyis rnam
110b7(mdo): bskor ba zla 'khyims mdzes par 'khor las dper bras 'dod lags kyang // 'od bcas zhal mthong ye shes snang ba 'thob kyis lhag/ 'dra ba'i dper blang dpe zla myed banod khyod la bstod// byams kyis nyon
110b8(mdo): mngon sel cing mabye nad kyis lam ston pa// tsha ba'i gdung bsel lam snang dper blang stong bsngags kyang // sdug bsngal gdung sel 'phags lam rnam par ston kyis lhag/ 'dra ba la dper blang dpe zla myed
110b9(mdo): bzhin khyod la bstod// gang gis bkra shis 'od mthong bag chags yongs 'byang ba// zla 'khyams nyi 'dra'i ltas 'dzin dpar blang bstod sngags kyang bag chags yongs sel steng du tshogs chen 'gengs kyis
111a1(mdo): ga// lhag/ 'dra ba'i dper brang dpe zla myed bzhin khyod la bstod// 'gro ba'i dod la'ang phun sum de 'dra'i sku mnga' bas// rgyal sras gzhan gyi yon tad sku gsum der 'dus shing // bde gshegs ma
111a2(mdo): lus kun dang tshul 'dra spyod panyam pa// rgyal sras rgyal ba'i mthu la gus par phyag kyang 'tshal// sgyu skar mang po 'tshogs ni phyog bzhi so sor dbang // rtag par lam nges dri myed zla ba'i 'khor das rgyu// legs
111a3(mdo): nyes dus kyi tshod ldan sna tshogs kun la ston// shar nub gung skur nam yang sdod pa myed par 'dong // 'phags pa nyan thos dge sbyong 'bras bu bzhir gnas pa// 'khor bar sdoms pas bsdams bzhin 'phrul sku
111a4(mdo): 'khor de gnas// dge sdig po dmyigs rgyu rkyen 'bras bu chos bzhid stod// yul dang dus tshul bskal pa'i rkyen bzhini 'thun par spyod// yon tan du mas 'phags pa nyan thos chen po rnams
111a5(mdo): tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab rnam grol ston mnga' ste// khyod// kyi 'khor kyang 'jig rten mos kyi mthur ldan pa glatso bo'i dam pa zha/ ba 'bring bcas la phyag kyang 'tshal//
111a6(mdo): sprul pa'i sku li le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / gza lhag dngos po rgyu ni skar ma yin pa ste// nyin mtshan gnyis zla 'i 'khor na myi snang kung myi gcod// brgya la brgya lam snang
111a7(mdo): na shar nub mam ru 'byung // skur pa rang gi mtshan nyid gzhi phyir yongs kyi gtong // rang rgyal nyid kyang byang chub sems las byung ba ste// bde gshegs 'khor dang rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs mye do phyogs/
111a8(mdo): gal te 'jig rten byung tshe dgon pa dben gnas kyang // byang chub sems kyi mtha' ru za myed mchog nyid 'thob// bse ru 'khor bcas 'gar zhing shin tu dben mos pa// byis pa bkri phyir shing rta rnam gsu
111a9(mdo): sbyar dang 'dra// gza lhag tshul dang sbyar snyam bde gshegs 'grub kyis lhag// thabs mkhas kun la 'dren pa dpe myed khyod la bstod// rang byang chub kyi le'u ste bcwa lnga pa'o//
111b1(mdo): 'dod pa'i khams kyi mtho ris rim pa drug gi lha// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rmugs shing bde myong pas// srid rgyu kun tu sbyor ba'i sred pa myi zad de// 'khor bar 'khor ba'i chos kyi rgyun myi gzhar myi gcod// khyod//
111b2(mdo): kyi thugs rje chen pos 'dod pa'i khams bzung ba// sdug bsngal lci bas rnam par gtses la lhag par bskyabs// smon lam stob kyis srid pa ched du ma btang ste// ji srid 'khor ba yod par btang snyoms blo myo dgongs
111b3(mdo): 'jig rten mtha' yas khams su lha rdzas bde bas rol// skye ba bzhin bzung ris su ched du 'byung ba sten// sems can ma lus don tu dka' ba sna tshogs mdzad// 'gro ba'i thams cad bskyob pa'i gtsol phyag
111b4(mdo): kyang 'tshal// / thugs rje chen po'i le'u ste/ bcu drug pa'o// / gzugs yod khams kyi mtho rigs rim pa bco brgyad lha// bsam gtan rtse gcig/
111b5(mdo): gnas pa'i dga' dang yid du ldan// 'dod chags myi dge la// chos ni rnam par srab cing spangs// thun mongs ma yin te 'dzi// na zas kyis lhag par 'tsho// khyod la ma 'dres bco brgyad
111b6(mdo): bde gshegs chos mnga' ba// rtag tu rtse gcig mnyam par/ bzhag pa'i dbyings dang ldan// ye shes snang la sgrib pa'i rnam kun kyang spangs// tshangs pa skar bcas nyan thos rang rgya lo kun
111b7(mdo): bas lhag// 'khrul pa myi mnga' su gsung thugs la skyon ma chags// tsa co gyi mnga' mun 'dug bdud kyis grags kyi bong // dgongs pa ma nyams chos la mongs pa'i zhes ma mchis// rtag tu mnyam bzhag
111b8(mdo): spyod lam bzhi la 'khrul gyi mnga'// 'du shes sna tshogs myi mnga' kun la mnyam nyid snyoms// ma brtags bya snyoms myi mnga' tshangs pa'i 'khor lo sbyor// mos pa nyams pa mye mnga' dge tshogs rgyun gyi 'chad
111b9(mdo): batshon 'grus nyams pa myi 'dul 'dul ba'i tshul bzhin sgrub// dgongs pa nyams pa'i myi yang 'dus gsum kun tu 'dug/ ting 'dzin nyams pa mye mnga' yang dag mnga' dang nyams// shes rab nyams
112a1(mdo): gan #sa 'jig gas nga // sul na la shes sa pa /
112a2(mdo): bsu// gsung gi 'tsha las ye shes rlon 'amarjes 'dug pas// lung bstan chos bgad thams cad don yod chen po 'jog// thugs kyi phrin las ye shes sngon 'gro la'i rjes 'jug pas// sems dang seM da
112a3(mdo): rnam shes mtshan du brjod las grol// 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs mkhyen 'jug pas// sngon tshe ci byung mi 'gags bgrang ba'i tshul gyis mkhyen// ma 'ongs dus la ma chags ma thogs mkhyen 'jug
112a4(mdo): pas// 'byung 'gyur 'jig 'gyur ma lus mngon sum nyid kyi sa mkhyend// da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs mkhye nad 'jug pas// chos rnams skad cig rdul phran yan lag
112a5(mdo): chad ji bzhin mkhyend// ma 'dres bco brgyad mnga' yang sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// rtag tu mnyam par bzhag kyang sems can don mang mdzad// rtog pa thams cad spangs kyang mkhyend pas
112a6(mdo): rnam par rol// bsam gyis myi khyab chos mnga' khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / gzugs myed rnal 'byor bzhi la gnas pa lha'i rnams
112a7(mdo): gzugs kyi rnam bral nad kyis rtse ba kun myed de// kha dog dbyings kyis bgrang ba de dag myi dmyigs kyang // skye bo'i sa ru dbye ba sems kyi rim pa yod// khyod la myi gnas mya ngan 'das pa'i mchog mnga' ba// grang
112a8(mdo): zag chos su brjod pa'i gzugs rnams yongs spangs te// spyod lam kun la spyod kyang shin tu mnyam bzhag pa// byang chub mtha' yas nam mkha' mardza ya tshul dang 'dra// chos kyi dngos po rdul tsam dmyigs myed
112a9(mdo): pa// gzung du ci'ang myed pa chung zad myed dang 'dra// gzung dang 'dzin pa sems tsam nyid du thugs chud pa// sems las gang yang myed pa rnam shes mtha' yas 'dra// rtog pa kun gyis dben pa ye shes rnam
112b1(mdo): 'byed// mtha' las grol bas 'du shes yod byed myed sangs dpa'adra// kye ma bzhi bzhin tshad las bya ngan 'das kyi 'gyur// bde rtag pag gnang nam dag nyid la phyag kyang 'tshas// skye mched mtha' yas kyi le'u ste
112b2(mdo): bcwa brgyad pa'o// / khyod la 'das pa'i dus kyi yon tan tshul bstod pas// byang chub sems dpa' kun la bsod pa nyid du 'gyur// da ltar ma 'ongs dus kyi yon tan tshul bstod pas// du
112b3(mdo): xxx
112b4(mdo): can bstong bsad// 'amam nyin pos dge 'dun can kyang / dbang gyu // skyem nu ma ge napa ga gsus po kun kyang na la bgyid bya da //
112b5(mdo): tan phyogs gcig mang lad kun tu ga la khyab// rgya che chad kyi ts+yai gas dang ldan la phyag kyang 'tshal// 'jig rten tshad ma'i tshul la/ sa 'das la phyag kyang 'tshal// khyod dang gang 'dras mkhyen/
112b6(mdo): pa'i gting la phyag kyang 'tshal// yon tan sna tshogs mad mchog mnga' la phyag kyang 'tshal// kun kyi ro sdod dbugs 'byin mgon la phyag kyang 'tshal// 'jig rten khams su rgyal sras mdu
112b7(mdo): cher byung ba'i tshe// gso sbyin yan lag brgyad ldan dge ba'i phyogs chos nas// byang chub phyogs dang pha rol phyin pa thams cad dang // ma 'dres bco brgyad bde gshegs chos kyi bar du bsrid// bram ze
112b8(mdo): rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rikris ldan nas// srid pa'i rtse mor smras pa'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur// nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sa bcu longam pa nas// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar yang 'byung zhe/
112b9(mdo): gsungs// de bzhin khyod la sems shing stong pa su smra yang // 'jig rten 'das pa dang 'jig rten chos brjod srid par 'gyur// de 'dra'i chos nyid mnga' ba'i yon tan rgyas grub pas// de ltar 'di dang 'thun pa'i
113a1(mdo): tshul gyis brjod cing bstod// de 'dra mang du byung ba'i tshe las 'phags pa la// snod kyi 'jig rten rim pa'i yon tan thams cad dang // khaMs gsum 'gro ba'i sems spyod rnam par dper bkod kyang // yon tan tshogs//
113a2(mdo): kyi gtogs la cha las spros ma nus// yon tan mnga' ba brjod rung chus lha mI bzung ste// brda' skad bying du bya ba'i tshig gis brjod kyi lang // legs kyi rnam pa dpes bstan 'os kyis myi bzung ste// sgrub bzod 'dra dper la
113a3(mdo): ma 'jig rten khams na myed// grangs su bya na bgrang ba'i rgyus lta myi bzung ste// de snyed bgrang ba'i rnam pa gyis kyi grangs la myed// brjod yas dag 'das bgrang du myed pa'i yon tan la// bstod pas mya chis yid la gcags/
113a4(mdo): bzhin phyag 'tshal bstod// / dkon mchog thams cad bstand pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// / brjod 'das bsam gyis myi khyab khams gsum snying po la// dad pa'i
113a5(mdo): sems kyis yon tan bstod pa'i tshig brjod kyang // 'brel pa mye// ra pa'i rtsal col tha snyad tsam du dper sbyor ba// rin chungs 'phang da/ mas skyon tu 'gyur snyam the tsom 'tshal// dper na dge 'dzus
113a6(mdo): skyes bu phyag dang ldan pa'i// byol song rigs dpa' yan chad kun la khong nas byams// rgod g.yung mtshungs par bsdus te ci sa gson mar gsos// rang gi chos bzhin so so'i dga' dang
113a7(mdo): bde la bkod// nyon mongs blos pongs spro ba myed bzhin chod myed cig/ skyes bu de la dad bsams rgyun tu bya zhes te// 'dzem pa'i ri lu rtswa dang spel te gtor cing byin// rgyan tam skyon gyi rnam pa cir gyurapa
113a8(mdo): gang du nye// ji lta bdag gis khyod la bstod pa de 'dra snyam// the tsom rnam par 'tshal cing ba spu g.yos par gyur// nongs kyis gnod bkur sdig bshags bzod pa gsol bas na// yun tu sdug sngal
113a9(mdo): rnam par sbyin par ma gyur da cig// bzod par gsol ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// / bkor mchog gsum la dmyigs pa'i dad pa'i bsams pa dang // 'phags pa phyi 'pham yin
113b1(mdo): tar rgya mtsho brjod pa las// rdul tsam 'gag zhig dge ba'i phyogs su 'gyur ba la// de'i bsod nams 'gro ba kun la bsngo zhing bdar // byang chub rlabs chen sems bskyed la brjod bstod pas// mtha' yas sems can ma
113b2(mdo): lus 'thun bar dang gyur te// bya shus mchog tu sems bskyed yor tan dge ldan pas// chu myig klu chen dpe 'das kun gyis thob par shog/ dang spyod sa nas chos sprin sar thugs legs bstod pas// sems can thos
113b3(mdo): cad pha rol phyi nad bcu rdzogs s+yad de/ rgyal ba sras kyi sa la rim par spyong gnas shing // rlung nas nags tshal dpe 'das kun gyis thob par shog/ yon tan sprul pa'i me tog mdzes ldan mtshe'u gtsang dang /
113b4(mdo): khyod yin mtshan mar dpung dang phyag na bsnams pa rnams// dmal ya lags 'phags pa'i chos la brjod bstod pas// 'gro ba dam lus chos kyi gter gyis brgyan par shog/ skyes mchog ma
113b5(mdo): dang dpe byad bzang po'i legs brjod de// 'jig rten chos la sa 'das pa'i tshul gyis bstod pas na// sems can ma lus pa// sod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs te// skyes chen mtshan dang
113b6(mdo): dpe byad bzang po rdzogs par shog/ rin cen bdun dang nyo bo rin cen tshul smos te// rgyal sras chos kyi gakhoms rgyam che stegs brjod pas// sems can lus longs spyod bde rgyu phul ldan zhing // chos kyi 'khor
113b7(mdo): lo'i rgyal po thob par shog/ tshogs gnyis mthu yis chos la sgyu mas rol bstod pas// sems can ma lus ye shes spobs pa'i mchog thob ste// spro mang sna tshogs ston pa'i gsung rab rgyar ldan zhing
113b8(mdo): 'ja sprid 'brug las 'das pa'i yon tan thob par shog/ byang chub phyogs chos dran pa nyer bzhag bzhi la gnas// 'phags las brgyad kyi bar du brjod de bskyod pas na// sems can ma lus byang chub
113b9(mdo): phyogs kyi chos rdzogs te// ri bdun chu'i dpe 'das chos rnams thob par shog/ so so yang dag rig pa mnga' brjod bstod pas na// sems can ma lus so so yang dag rig ldan zhing // 'gro ba thams
114a1(mdo): cad 'dren pa'i dpung gnyen skyabs gyur da te// ri rab bang rim dpe las 'das don thob par shog/ gzungs mchog bcu gnyis mnga' ba brjod de bstod pas na// sems can ma lus gzungs mchog
114a2(mdo): grangs myed kun rdzogs shing // mtha' yas chos rnams rnam pa kun tu byang chub ste// ri rab bang rim dpe las 'das nyi rlob par shog/ mthu chen dbang bcu'i chos rnams brjod de bstod pas ra / sems can
114a3(mdo): ma sus dbang sgyur chos rnams ku rdzogs shing // grangs myed chos la yid bzhin 'dod dgur dbang sbyar te// ring ba ros bcu pa la la myed pa brjod de bstod pas ru// sems can ma lus thams cad bstobs bcu kun
114a4(mdo): rdzogs shing // bdud dang dpung bcas rgol bas myi thub chos la na te// ri rab ngos bcu'o dpe las 'das don thob par shog/ myi 'jigs sde bzhi mnga' ba brjod bstod pas na// sems can
114a5(mdo): ma lus thams cad myi 'jigs bzhi ldan te// log pas brgya/ da bar rgol ba'i tshig smra myi grag ste// ri rab rtse bzhi dpe las/ 'das don thob par shoka// bde gshegs sgra gsum mnga' ba'i
114a6(mdo): tshul brjod bstod pas na// sems can ma lus rgyal ba'i sku gsum yongs rdzogs shing // myi mnyam mnyam pa'i sku mchog bla na myed grub ste// nyi zla nam mkha' dpe las 'das don thob
114a7(mdo): bar zhog/ sku dang dbu'i 'od mchog tshul 'arjod bstod pas na// sems can ma lus 'od gzer grangs myed tshogs ldan zhing // sna tshogs 'od kyis 'jig rten mtha' yas kus khyen te// gnyi zla ma khyims
114a8(mdo): pa'i dpe las 'das don thob par shog/ khro bo rang rgyud nyan thos tshul bstod brjod ldan// sems can ma lus mnga' chen mthu ldan yongs rdzogs shing // myi ldog byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang ldan 'gyur
114a9(mdo): te/ gza dang rgyu skar dpe las 'das don thob par shog/ thugs rje chen pos sems cad khams gzung brjod pastod pas// sems can ma lus thams cad thugs rje che rdzogs shing // 'gro ba kun kyang dadung
114b1(mdo): gnyen skyabs dpa'agon 'gyur te// 'dod khams mtho ris dpe las 'das don thob par shog/ ma 'dres bco brgyad mnga' ba'i tshul brjod bstod pas na// sems can ma lus sangs rgyas ma 'dres chos rdzogs she/
114b2(mdo): lA mye 'phags pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su mchod bkur ste// gzugs yod mthos ris dpe las 'das don thob par shog/ myi gnas mya ngan 'das pa'i tshul brjod bstod pas na// sems can ma lus 'gro ba/
114b3(mdo): kun gzigs sar chud cing // dus gsum bde gshegs ye shes mchog la gnas gyur da te// gzugs myed rnal 'byor dpe las 'das don thob par shog// #// bsod nams bsngo ba
114b4(mdo): le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o// / @6// 'phag byas pa la bstod pa rdzogs so// @#// khams gsum gis bstod pa zhes bya ba// 'phags pa
114b5(mdo): la bstod pa the com bsal ba'i le'u ste dang ba'o// / 'phags pa'i myi 'pham rgyal mchab khyod// shag kyi seng ges lung bstan pa// nam zhig mngon par sangs rgyas tshe// mying ni
114b6(mdo): byams pa brjod ces gsung // de nas byams par grangs pa la/ 'gal dang nor bar 'dzin pa 'byung // de yi me com 'dis bskul zhing // chos rje'i yon tan ma cam smos// 'gal ba'i spyod tu bgyid pa de//
114b7(mdo): sbyin tu rung ba sman lags kyang // sbyin par bgyi ba'i dus shes pas// mtshan dang sa gnyis spel zhing 'dra// thabs mkhas chen po'i rgya gting ste// 'dul ba'i sgo mang ston pa na// mngon sangs rgyas nas ring
114b8(mdo): long kyang // da cung rgyal sras tshul 'dzin grang // khyod ni lam gyi 'dren mkhyen la// thams cad rnam par mkhyen brjod pa// rang bzor ma byas gtan tshigs su// chos kyi phun da ri ka bzhugs// shag kya sangs
114b9(mdo): rgyas ring ma lon/ byang chub sa rum 'bon pa gzigs// de kun pa'i 'khor zhes gsung // de la bal yang be tsom skyed// nga ni skal pa grangs byed du// byi mdzes 'di ru sangs rgyas pa'o// bslob ma sbyin byas
115a1(mdo): rtags bstan te// de dag 'dul dbang thabs shes gsung // sngon gi tshul dang sbyar bsams na// bde gshegs kun kyang tshogs mnyam par// byams par brjod pa sangs rgyas rtags// the tsom de bstsal khyod la/
115a2(mdo): 'os// sku dang los spyod dpe myed pa// bdag 'dra'i spyod yul myi 'gyur te// gzugs bris mthong las 'os dpags nas// mnga' dku'i lha rdzas lags su gzung // gdan gyi pad ma rin cen grang // chu ba me
115a3(mdo): tog 'tsher zhing legs// snying po yangs la ze ba bzang // nyin mtshan 'bye 'jug dus dang 'thun// bzang sdug me tog kun las 'phags// pad mar nges sam gzhan zhig snyam// the tsom rtog 'dod gzhi ru che
115a4(mdo): mnga' brnyes 'gro ba'i phan pas rol// yon tan pad ma 'dra sprul tam// thog drung dpe legs bzang sdug pa// khyod kyi rim rten chos su 'os dkyil yangs rgya chen spyod kyi tshul// ze bzangs nyams
115a5(mdo): byed 'khor gyi dpe// 'bye 'dzums dus bzhin 'das myi chags// dus gzhes 'jig rten myi chags tshul// 'khor los sgyur ba'o// rgyal po ni// sngon shed dge bcu rdzogs kyi don// rin cen bdun la
115a6(mdo): dbang bar 'gyur/ nye ba'i rin cen rkyen du grub// gser gyi 'khor lo dbang byed dang // glang po cang shes thal kar gnyis// rta mchog rin can mgyogs pa dang // bud myed rin cen yid 'ong bzhi// nor bu rin
115a7(mdo): cen 'od dang ldan// khyim bdag rim chen dgongs 'byor drug/ blon po ra ni can yid bzhin bdun// de dag longs spyod rkyen tu grub// nye ba'i rin cen ral gyi dang // cis bye shigs pa'i pags pa dang / dam pa'i lam mchog
115a8(mdo): dgon pa dang // 'dod pa lnga ldan nags tshal bzhi// khyim rab bsam dkur ldan pa dang // gos mchog rang 'byung yang dang drug/ lham mchog dpag tshad brgyad 'gros 'dud// de 'dra'i rdzas 'chang btsun pa
115a9(mdo): grags// khyod ni chos kyi 'khor lo rje// bdud btul rgyal ba 'gro ba'i gtso// 'khor lor chos kyi 'khor lo mnga'// nam mkha'i mthar snyom dbang yang sbyar// rin cen glang por theg pa gcig/ de la rigs/
115b1(mdo): bzhi brtan par gzhog/ so so rig par rim ced na// 'gro ba skal ldan thogs myed skyel// rin cen btsun mo dpal mnga' ste// sems can kun la bde ba stobs// rin cen nor bu 'od mnga' ste// des reg sos/
115b2(mdo): kyi snang ba 'thob// chos phyar rim cer khyim bdag ste// bde bshegs sa bon gter yang gzigs// byin brlabs rim cen blon por mnga'// ci bzhed de bzhin mnyes par 'bul// rin cen ral gyis shes rab yang /
115b3(mdo): spyong dgu gnas su rang dbang 'gro// kri snang dkar rgya rin cen dpags// dge blangs sdig bor skad kyi tshul// rin cen mal du bsam gtan bcas// g.yer dang 'khrug myed bde zhing 'jam// mthar kyis dgu myod tshal du mad
115b4(mdo): dga' bsil grib ma dben dang ldan// rin cen khyim du stug por bkod darnam par gsum gyi sgo dang ldan// rin cen gos su gtsang kanas dal// khrel ltas chos kyis rnam par 'gyebs// rin cen lAm
115b5(mdo): du mkhyen rkang ldan// gar 'gro ci bzhed thogs pa myed // de 'a 'i rin cen rnam grangs pa// gang gi rdzas kyang dpe myi bzod// ris pa kha dog gnam 'dra bsdams// byang chub mchog sdod khyod
115b6(mdo): la mngal// bcud mi bdud rtsi phan mang byed// nges par ril ba bdud rtsi phyin// gzugs kyi mchog ni ril bar snang // byams pa chen po bdud rtsi bzhin// chos kyi tshul ni khams gsum bsil// nyon mongs kyu
115b7(mdo): shing bsnams pa sman gyi mchog/ kar skyes nam byung dus dang sbyor// nges par shing myin yon tan tshogs// sdug bsngal nad la sman du 'gyur// dpal gnas rin ces mdzes pa'i// mchod rten dbu la bsnam
115b8(mdo): ba'i ni// mchod rten myin chos kyi dbyings// chos nyid bkur stir dbu la bsnams// dge ba bcu ni rmangad du 'gyur// theg pa gsum gyi khri 'phang bcas// rnam thar brgyad kyi thar ma smras// chos sde bcu gnyis
115b9(mdo): 'phreng bar byas// chos dbyings spos myang bum par snang // byin rlabs dam pa mu nyur btags// smon lam chen po'i srog shing btsugs// snying rje chen po gdugs su 'gabs// zag myed chos kyi char ka ba wA
116a1(mdo): dus gsum bde gshegs sku gdung tshul// 'phags pa'i rmad chos kun rdzogs pa// mgon po khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// / sa dang pha rol phyind pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//
116a2(mdo): khyod kyi che ba dpes brjod na// 'jig rten khams dang ma mchis kyang // 'byung ba chen por char brjod pas// rim pa'i tshul las 'ol byir sbyar// rlung gyi dkyil 'khor gzugs myed kyis snod kyi 'jig rten kun bteg ltar/
116a3(mdo): khyod kyi yi dam mthar myed rlung // glen pa phyal po'ang ma lus 'dzin// de'i steng na gser gnas pa// g.ya myed dpal ldan mnyen brling ltar// khyod kyi skyon myed stobs kyi tshul// sgrib pa yangs pa rgyal po'i gdung //
116a4(mdo): de la chu gnas ci yang myed// mngon par byed myed dang sbyar ltar// khyod kyi smon lam phan dgu skyed// las su byas don tu 'gyur// de las gting 'byung gnas te// rtsa ba bzang dgu sbyin rgyas ltar//
116a5(mdo): khyod kyi thabs la dge dgu rten// bsod nams grangs myed yid pa zhin 'grub// lcags ri khor yug 'phan myed pa// chu chen grong zhing dang byed ltar// dmyigs spangs khyod kyi shes rab raM/
116a6(mdo): zhi gnas 'dzin cing rnam par dag// rgya mtsho che ba'i lhun gis grags// rin cen sna tshogs 'byung gnas ltar// khyod kyis bsam gtan rgya mtsho las// chos mchog rin can kun kyang 'byung // gleng bzhi phyogs
116a7(mdo): cig kyi gnas kyi// shar nub lho byang gnas 'chas ltung // khyod kyi brtson 'grus nyi tshe phyir// 'bar ba'i shugs la bsdus myi 'dus// gzhongs 'di brdzis te spang ba dang // brkos shing gnod byas khyod byed ltar//
116a8(mdo): khyod kyi bzod pa yangs che ba// bzod du ma bas bde la 'gong // gangs ri dkar gtsang lha gnyen gnas// mtho bsal gsal skyabs tshol ba ltar// khyod kyi tshul khrims rnam dag mchog// sems can
116a9(mdo): tshe ba kun gyi skyabs// nags tshal sna tshogs yan lag ldan// sbyin pa sgyid myi 'byed ster ba ltar// nam dag yid bzhin sbyin gtong ba// 'gon po khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// / char bab nyi ma sha
116b1(mdo): gyur dam/ gnas la 'ja dang mkhas yang snang // tshon bzang sdug snyam rtog pa 'ang skye// yams ka'i ltas snyam 'jigs pa 'ang byung // sprul pa'i sku'i le'u ste drug pa// / zla ba 'od gsal rang /
116b2(mdo): bzhin bsil// bdag la 'gyur myed gzhan dbang 'gyur// yar la dkar 'phel mar gnag 'bri/ snang ba mtshan yang nyi ma bzhin// gzugs brnyan snod rkyen che chung 'byung // byang chub spyod pa ngos la snang // nam na zla
116b3(mdo): 'byims gnyis dro ltas// skar phran 'khor gyi brjid dang ldan// de bzhin sprul sku byams chen ldan// rtag kyang 'dul dbang skye 'jigs ston// byung dgur dkar 'phel gnag kyang 'bri// rnyog lnga'i mun khrod yon tan 'bar
116b4(mdo): sems cad sdod rkyen so sor mthong // byang chub byor tshul grangs myed ston 'od mchog bag chags 'byang gi ltas// mchod pas 'khor gyis btsun du btsun// gang tshe 'jigs rten kun grags par// mngon
116b5(mdo): bar sangs rgyas tshul ston cing // tshogs 'chang sems can smin mdzad de// snod du gyur pas sku mthong ba// sha ru tshul gyi / byibs 'dra yang // pha ma'i rgyu las grub pa myed// thabs mkhas
116b6(mdo): yab dang shes rab yum// chos la skur grub rang bzhin gtsang / sngon tshe bskal pa dpag 'das su dge ba mang po rgyun spyad de/ 'gro la phyir zhugs pas na// 'bras bu sbyin pa sngon tu snang /
116b7(mdo): legs pa re re'i rgyu grub pa// mtshan mazang sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang // dpe byad brgyad cu so sor grub// swA myi dag kyang dper myi bzod// rgyu skar phyogs bzhi so sor dbang // rtag par lam des zla bar 'grog/
116b8(mdo): bzang ngan dus tshod kun la ston// nyin mtshar mtshungs par sdod phyed 'gro// de bzhin 'phags pa'i nyan thos rnams// god myed khrims ldan zham ring mdzad// dge sdig rgyu rkyen chos bzhin ston// bskal
116b9(mdo): ba'i rkyen bzhin 'thun par gyod // yon tan ches 'phags nyan thos rnams// tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab ldan// phreng bar sbyor ba yongs bcad cing // lci bas gzor po'i 'ur kun bor//
117a1(mdo): longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku 'i le'u ste bdud pa// / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sdang 'chang ba// skye dang 'bri myed rang bzhin gsal// skar bran kun rlag gza cher snang // gnyi shar des bskur
117a2(mdo): nyal dgur ldang // ka la mtho dgur sngar yang 'chang // ga la dma' dgur sngar yang nub// dus tshod myi 'phrul 'thun pa'i gzugs// nam na gnyi 'a khyims char 'bab ltas// de bzhin khyod kyi longs spyod sku//
117a3(mdo): skye dang bya ngan 'da' gyi sring // zham ring sras dang khro babo// mgon po'i mthus bskul sa sar 'bar // dge rtsa che ches mthong bar gyur// dge rtsa chung chung mthong kyi nus// 'bras bu gang 'dod stor gyi ngogs/
117a4(mdo): tshogs kun bsal ba yid bzhin ldan// 'dod chags sku mtsho dang chos mthong ltas// 'od byung gnas las chos don rig/ chos kyi bdud rtsi char du 'bebs// byang chub myug gu sdong po skyed/
117a5(mdo): gnyi zla gzang bcas sus mthong ba// de che re ring ltas su bya// ka Ta rnams 'gyer 'du bas byed pa yang // rgyu skar lam bzhin/ nges pa myed// mgyogs bul skar mkhan rtsis kyis shes// rang
117a6(mdo): ga~M chos las tshul myi 'gal// phan 'gond ltas las bag kyang byed// de yang 'gro la phan phyir bston// de bzhin khro bo rdo rje'i ga dung // 'dul ba'i bsdam las 'da' mod kyang // sdig pa'i mtsham
117a7(mdo): su de myi 'da'// dge sdig mngon stod nga rgyal 'dul// / chos kyi sku'i le'u ste brkyang ba// / de la dad pas gang sgrub pa// tshe 'di nyid la rang dbang thob// drag rdal snga
117a8(mdo): tshogs rigs par spyod// de yang 'gro la phan pa'i don// gza lag 'char nub kar rtsub// gnye zla'i 'khor du mdor myi sdang // brgya lam snang na mthar ru 'byung // rang gi mtshan nyid gzhar myi gtong // de bzhin
117a9(mdo): rang rgyal bse ru pa// rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs myi rigs// gal te dgon par dben gnas kyang // mtha' lta bud myed mchog nyid thob// mtha' la gos shing chags myed par// dngos po 'byung dgu go yang 'byed/
117b1(mdo): chos sku rnam par rtogs spangs pa// yon tan rdzu 'phrul go yang byed// de bzhin rtag chad bral gyi sku// dpag dka' gting zar sngon 'gro ba// dus gsum dus la chags thogs myed// gzugs myed rnal 'byor
117b2(mdo): gzhar gnas pa// gzugs la gtse ba kun myed de// 'dog dbyibs su ma dmyigs kyang // sems kyi rim pas sa dbyer yod// de bzhin myi gnas mya ngan 'das// gang zag chos su brjod spangs shing // spyod
117b3(mdo): lam spyod kyang mnyam par gzhog/ mye mar shi ltar 'da' ba sbyin// rgyal sras 'jig rten byung ba'i tshe// gos sbyod yan lag brgyad ldan nas// ma 'aldas paco brgyad chos rnams dang // gtsug lag rgya che kun kyang
117b4(mdo): phreng// rgyal rigs bram ze rus btsun dang // srid pa'i rtse mo ste/ rnams gnas// nyan thos rnams dang rang rgyal byang chub bar du'o dbyung bar 'gyur// de 'dra'i che bas 'phags pa la// srid kyi 'ang/
117b5(mdo): rten rim pa dang // khams gsum spyod pa dper bkod kyang // yon tan cha las spong ma nus// brjod du rung rgyus lta bzung ste// bda' skad tshig gis brjod myi lang // dpe bstan 'os kyis
117b6(mdo): myi bzung ste// bsnun bzod dper yang 'dra ba myed// rgya chede tshogs ldan la phyag kyang 'tshal// khyod 'dras mkhyend kyi gtong la phyag kyang 'tshal// yon tan ma lus mnga' la phyag kyang 'tshal//
117b7(mdo): kun kyi rwa snod mgon la phyag kyang 'tshal// 'phags pa'i myi 'pham 'gon po la// mu tom cal col brjod pa 'di// bstod pa'i sems su dmyigs mod kyi// brjod nongs spang bar 'gyur gyis dogs/
117b8(mdo): sems kyis bzang gi rgyan dmyigs kyang // bltas na myi sdug dong bar 'os// ji ltar bdag gis khyod bstod pa// la la de 'drar gyur pa na// gnor bkur sdug bsngal sbyin ma gyur// dkon mchog
117b9(mdo): gsum la dmyigs pa dang // yon tan rgya mtsho brjod pa las// rdul tsam 'ga' zhig bden 'gyur ma// bsod nams 'gro ba kun la bdang // / byams pa la bstod pa theg pa chen po
118a1(mdo): yod// // rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du// bud dA na ma tI ban tsa sho ra dza tu ban can ga ta// bod skad du/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan lA
118a2(mdo): stong bzhi brgya lnga bcu ma gsum pa// / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma byed pa'i nam mkha'o dpal kye rgyal po/
118a3(mdo): mye mtshungs pa'i sman yon tan shin tu bzang dpal gyi 'od me tog pad mo bai dUr+ya'i 'od gzer sku gzugs rin chen gyi chog dam pa la'i mchod pa// gtsug tor sbyin mtshams mchog brgya dad pa gnyis zla grangs myed pa bzhi
118a4(mdo): du snang ba smon lam gyis rab tu brgyan pas sprul pa shin tu mnga' ba/ chos kyi dbyings las byung ba chags pa myed pa'i rgya la po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbyin mtshams
118a5(mdo): nyi ma bzhin 'bar ba rin cen zla ba me tog pad mo gser stug po lta bu'i sku'i rnam par snang bas thogs pa myed pa'i spyan mang po phyogs bcur 'od gzer gyis khyab par mdzad cing / 'jig
118a6(mdo): rte nad gyi khams thams cad du snang ba dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tsha la lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i gling gyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi skal pa chen po 'khor ba las mtshan tsam 'dzin pas ma lus par thar
118a7(mdo): pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa snying rje'i 'od chos rgya mtsho'i 'od gzer snyed sgrogs pa'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ri bo chos kyi dbyings phyogs kun tu
118a8(mdo): gsald par 'bar ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho'i 'od sgrogs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan grags pa'i myi mtshungs pa rnam par thard
118a9(mdo): pa'i 'od kyi rgya los phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sprin gyi grong khyer 'od mar mye'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos dam mkha' gyed du 'byung dpal kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal//
