290b7(mdo): 'du shes bskyed pa dang bcu ste/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyis/ nyon mongs par gyi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' skyes bu dam pa khams
290b8(mdo): gsum na bgrod pa'i tshesnying rje cher pos kazhi byas des/ ma rol pa'i zhing der 'od 'dres kyang rdul gyi gcig ste/ de bas na bsam khyab dka' zhes bya'o// gang zhig 'jig rten nas dag na/ bska
290b9(mdo): pa gcig gi bar dag tu// tshul khrims dam du bsrung ba 'i// skyes bu de ni skad cig dga' ba tsam// byams pa pyad pa dam pa mchog/ gang zhig 'jig rten sa 'di ru// lus dang ngag yang sdig spyad
291a1(mdo): ngan song gsum du lhung nges kyang // bya bas sems de yis 'phral du 'byung // byang chub sems dpa' 'ga' zhig gis/ 'jig rten nang bar skyes na yang // / 'jigs dang dogs pa maHskyed cig/ ngan
291a2(mdo): song ltung ba'i sdig yod kyang // mgo bo na ba tsam gyis 'byang// gang zhig 'chi ba gcod 'dod dam// nyon mongs sgrib pa spang 'dod pa/ 'jig rten ngan 'dir skyes na yang / dam chos bsrung bas shes rab
291a3(mdo): 'phel// rnam dag zhing du bskal pa 'bum// tshul khrims rnam dag spyad pa bas// deng nas sang gi bar dag tu// 'jig rten 'di na gnas kyang sra// / de ni ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngas ni myi 'brug 'jig rten dang /
291a4(mdo): bde ba can gi 'jig rten gnyis shin tu rnam dag mthong ba na// sdug bsngal bya ba'i myi yang myed// khams gsum de ru bsod nams bya ba ni/ dka' ba snyam du myi mdzad de/ gang gis 'jig rten 'di dag tu // rang gi myi bzod
291a5(mdo): bzod bya ste// pha rol po yang bzod gzhug na// de ni bsod nams// dam pa mchog/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams// 'jig rten nang 'dir bgrod pa'i tshe// nyon mongs mya ngan ma byed par//
291a6(mdo): sems can thams cad 'dren bya he/ brtson 'grus brtan pa'i sa mas bskyed na// tha myed byang chub myur du thob// de nas bcom lnga na 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dam
291a7(mdo): mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis/ deng 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi rgyu dang rkyen zhig zhu zhing mchis na/ de bzhin gshegs pas skabs dbye bar gnang
291a8(mdo): na/ spobs pa bskyed de/ zhu bar bgyi'o// zhes gsold pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs so rigs kyi bu khyod sangs rgyas brgya stong du ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa/ byang chub seMs
291a9(mdo): dpa'i thabs spyad pa la mkhas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi phyir byang chub pyod pa'i brtson 'grus brtan pa'i dri legs kyis 'dod pa bzhin dris shig/ ngas khyod la bye brag phyed par bshad do// bcom ldan
291b1(mdo): 'das kyis skabs dbye bar ka nang nas bcom ldan 'das la/ ra ma ma kha'i snying pos/ 'di skad ces gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' cib kyis da/ brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub kyi sems
291b2(mdo): la ma mchis par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'as mi bgyis da/ nges pa'i tshig la bgyod pa la mchis par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas rtse bkyis ya/ rtsa ba 'phel bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'as
291b3(mdo): mi bgyis ya/ 'jigs pa ma mchis shing tshul gyi g.yo bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sa ci bgyis na/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'grub par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'as mib gyis / sa cig nas
291b4(mdo): sa bcu'i bar du legs par 'tshal bar 'gyur// byang chub se mas dpa'as mib kyis da/ babs la shi nang tu mkhas par 'gyur byang chub sems dpa'as mi bgyis ya/ sems can gyi nyorang
291b5(mdo): pa bgyid par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'as ci bgyis ya/ tshe rabs su byang chub kyi sems chud rtsi gzad par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'as ci bgyis ya/ sems 'apyod pa nas
291b6(mdo): pa cig las rnam pa sna tshogs su spyod pa ma mchis par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' ma ci bgyis pa/ chom rin po che legs par bsgre ba par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' sa kyis khyim
291b7(mdo): tshul khrims dang 'dul ba las bcas pa'i kha na la yo ba las 'byung bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'as ci bgyis ya/ nyon mongs pa rnams 'gags par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'as cib kyis ra
291b8(mdo): tshogs mang po kun dang mthun par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sa ci bgyis na/ chos kyi sbyin pa'i sgo lags par 'byed par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'as mi bgyis nga / sngon kyi dbang gyis ma nus dge
291b9(mdo): ba'i rtsa ba khyig tor bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'as ci bgyis na gzhan gyis ba ha nad pa la rag phyi lus par rang bzhin gyis/ pha rol tu phyi dad pa drug pyad par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa
292a1(mdo): ci bgyis ne/ bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin btang ste/ 'dod pa'i khams su skyes par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sa ci bgyis na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir myi ldog par 'gyur/ byang chub/
292a2(mdo): sems dpas mi bgyis ya/ dge ba 'i rtsa ba 'phel ba dang / khams gsum du bgrod tsang/ sems cad la bsto pa bgyid de/ sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid rgyun myi 'chang bar 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
292a3(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la legs so zhes bya ba byir te/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la/ byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba rnams zhu nus pa 'ang shi nad tu legs so// legs so// khyod
292a4(mdo): legs par nyon la dran pa mngon tu zhog shig/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bka' bzhin du zos par smond te/ mnyand cing mnos par 'tshal lo zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
292a5(mdo): 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la bka'/ stsal da pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sa chos bzhi dang / ldan na/ rdul zhugs dang dka' thub kyi sems myi gdung bar
292a6(mdo): 'gyur ro// chos bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad la ste brje bskyed pa dang / brtsod 'grus bskyed cing le lo myi byed pa dang / skye shi'i 'khor ba rmyi lam tsam dang 'dra bar shes pa dang / yang
292a7(mdo): dag pa'i yid kyis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bsam pa dang bzhi ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na dka' thub dang rdul zhugs kyi sems gdung ba myed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sa
292a8(mdo): yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ nges pa'i tshig la bar ma dor 'gyod par myi 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ nges pa'i tshig chos la bdag myed par mngon par chud ces brjod pa dang / nges pa'i tshig skye gnas sro cog la dang /
292a9(mdo): pa'i 'du shes bskyed po myaM rigs shes brjod pa dang / nges pa'i tshig gis theg pa chen po la rgyun tu bsngags pa dang / nges pa'i tshig gis las dag sdig gi 'bras bu myi rlag ces brjod pa dang bzhi'o// byang
292b1(mdo): chub sems dpa' sa yang chos bzhi dang ldan da/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// bzhi ga zhe na/ tshul khrims bsrung ba dang / mang du zos pa dang / sbyir ba byin pa dang / rab tu byung ba
292b2(mdo): dang bzhi'o// byang chub sems dpa'as yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'jigs pa myed cing/ tshul las kyi g.yo bar 'gyur ro// bzhi ga bzhen/ bye hor ba dang / myi snyan pa grags pa dang / smad cing sma
292b3(mdo): pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis gnod kyang myi g.yo ba dang bzhi'o// byang chub sems dpa' sa yang cos bzhi dang ldan pa// chos dka' po yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro// bzhi ka len/ pha rol po las
292b4(mdo): dge sdig yid ches par baho dad pa dang / sbyir pa la lan gyi re ba dang / dam pa'i chos la bsrung zhing skyong ba dang / shes rab chen pos byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ston par byed pa dang /
292b5(mdo): bzhi'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'as yang chos pa/ zhi dang / ldan na sa gcig nas sa bcu'i bar tu legs par 'gyu/ ra ro// chos bzhi gang zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yun ring du
292b6(mdo): bskyed pa dang / nyes skyoran thams cad sesad pa dang / thabs shin du mkhas pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa la brtson 'grus ci spyad pa byang chub tu sngo ba dang bzhi'o// byang chub sems dpa' sa yas
292b7(mdo): chos pazhi dang ldan / babs la shin sus khas par 'gyur ro// ba'i gang med/ sems can gyi yid dang mazungan bar byed pa dang / kan gi bsod nams dang yon tan la rjes su yi rang ba'i sems bskyed pa
292b8(mdo): dang / sdig yod na 'gyod tshangs bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba gdas pa dang bzhi'o// byang chub sems dpa' sa yang chos pa'i dang ldan pa/
292b9(mdo): cad kyi to dad pa byed par 'gyur ro// ba'i gang zhe na/ rtag tu sems can la phan pa dang / bde ba sgrub par byed pa dang / rang gi dgal ba yongs su 'dor ba dang / nyes des byas te bzod pa bsgom pa
293a1(mdo): dang / le lo spang ba dang bzhi'o// byang chub sems dbus la bcom pazhi du sngun/ che bas rabs su bya chub kyi sems chud kyi thol par 'gyur ro// bzhig pa me/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
293a2(mdo): thams cad la rtag tu dran par byed pa dang / bsod nams byas so cog sems can kyi phyir/ bla na myed pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bste nad pa dang / theg pa chen po yongs su bslas
293a3(mdo): par byed pa dang bzhi'o// byang chub sems dpa'as chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems spyod pa rnam pa gcig las/ rnam pa sna tshogs su myi myad bar 'gyur ro// bzhig pa zhe na/ nyan thos kyi sems spang ba dang /
293a4(mdo): rang sangs rgyas kyi sems spang ba dang / chos bsgrub pa skyo mya ngas pa dang / chos ci thos pa gzhan la bsta dad par byed pa dang / bzhi'o// byang chub sems dpa'as yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/
293a5(mdo): chos rin po che legs par sgrub par 'gyur ro// bzhi gi zh-in/ theg pa chen po'i chos dkon pa'i phyir/ rin po che dang 'dra ba maru shes bskyed pa dang / theg pa chen po'i chos sems kyi nga
293a6(mdo): thams cad se yad pa'i phyir smad dang / 'dra bar blta ba dang theg pa chen po la chos nam yang mya rlag po'i phyir/ nor gyi dbyinapa 'dra bar lta ba dang / theg pa chen po'i chos mya ngan las
293a7(mdo): 'da' bar byed pa'i phyir/ sdug bsngal 'gog par lta ba dang / bzhi'o// byang chub sems dpa' sa yang chos bzhi dang ldan pa/ tshul khrims nyams pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i kham ma yo ba las 'byung bar 'gyur
293a8(mdo): ba'i klung med/ chos rnams 'dra ba skyed pa'i phyir/ chos la myi skye ba'i bzod pa thob pa dang / chos rnams song myed pa'i chos la/ myi 'gog pa'i bzod pa thob pa dang / chos rnams rgyu dang rkyed las skyes pa shes
293a9(mdo): pa'i phyir/ chos la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i bzod pa thob po dang / tha dad pa'i sems rgyud myed pa'i phyir/ myi gnas pa'i bzod pa thob pa pa'i'o// byang chub sems dpa' se chos bzhi dang sngan na
293b1(mdo): nyon mongs pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe/ yang dag pa'i dran pa mngon du gzhag pa dang / dbang po rnams bsdams pa dang / dge ba'i chos kyi stobs bskyed nus pa dang / dben pa'i gnas
293b2(mdo): su dad cing 'du 'dzi spang bar bya ba dang bzhi'o// byang chub sems dpa'as yang chos pa'i dang ldan pa/ tshogs yang po kun dang sa thum par 'gyur ro// bzhi ga zher/ bdag chos bsgrub pa yang khyad par thob par
293b3(mdo): bslab pa dang / le lo myed par rtag tu bkur nyi dang / gus pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / chos kyi phan pa 'bal zhig chol ki bdag myi spyos pa dang / gzhan dag la dag po'i chos ba ha nad kyang rnyed pa dang bkur
293b4(mdo): sti dang / grags pa kyi 'chol ba dang / bzhi 'o// byang chub mas dpa'as pa gro ba'i dang ldan na/ chos kyi sbyin pa'i sgo legapar 'byed par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang len/ dam pa chos
293b5(mdo): yongs su bsrung zhing skyob pa dang / rang gi shes rab sa pan bar byed cing / gzhan la le ha nad par byed po dang / rtag turabs kyi chos spyod pa dang / rnam par dka' ma dag pa
293b6(mdo): choms kyi rtog pa dang cana'o// byang chub sems dpa' mchos pazhi dang ldan na/ sngon gi dbang kyis mabus dge thol bal khyo brlag par 'gyur ro/ bzhi ga len/ pha rol tha ma nyes spyod sa dbang gyi bsar
293b7(mdo): ba dang / de sdang cad la rtag tu byams sems bsgom pa dang / rtag tu chos thams cad rten 'brel du bshad pa dang / bra na myed pa'i byang chub la rtag su dran par bya ba dang / bzhi'o// byang chub sems dpa'as/
293b8(mdo): yabacos bzhi dang ldan na/ gzhad kyis baha dad pa la rag ma lus par rang pozhin kyis pha rol tu phyi dad pa drug pyad par 'gyur ro// bani ga zhe na/ rtag tu chos kyi sbyon pas gzhanas sbyir
293b9(mdo): dang / ka dad kyi 'anam yo ba phye brjod pa dang / chos kyis bsdus te/ sems cad gi nyon pa la yakhas pa dang / chos zab mo la chub par byed pa dang bzhi'o// byang chub sems dpa' sa yang chos
294a1(mdo): bzhi dang ldan na/ bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzinang btang ste/ 'dod pa'i khams su mngon tu skyes par 'gyur ro// bzhi kang zhe na/ sems mnyen des su bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthu rnyed par bya
294a2(mdo): bya ba dang / sems can thams cad myi gtong ba dang / shes rab dang thabs mkhas pa'i mthu stobs rgyun tu bsgom nus pa dang bzhi'o// byang chub sems dpa' sa yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
294a3(mdo): las phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ro// chos bzhi gang zhe na/ skye shi'i 'khor ba la grangs myed par myo ra yang / skyo ba'i sems kyi bskyed pa dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas tshad byed pa la mchod pa bya ba dang / bya mas sems
294a4(mdo): tshad myed pa bsgom pa bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes tshad myed pa la mos pa bskyed pa dang / bzhi'o rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sa yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid rgyun gyi
294a5(mdo): 'chad par 'gyur ro// chos bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can tham/ sa cad kyi phyir/ smon da lam m+bi gtong ba dang / sbyin pa'i spyod lam la dad pa dang / brtson 'grus chen po la 'dun pa dang /
294a6(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi chos la sems zab mos/ rgyu rang tu spyad pa dang bzhi ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum du bgrod cing / spyod pa rnam pa bzhi po rnam grangs
294a7(mdo): su spyad de/ sems can la phar pa dang / bde bar byas shing 'jig rten las bzla bar bsgoms pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid rgyu gyi 'chad par 'gyur ro// ro bo reg pa chen po macos rnam pa bzhi bzhir bshad par/
294a8(mdo): lha bzhi khri me/ bla ra myed pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// myi las nyi khri lnga ho po de/ chos la mye skye ba'i bzod pa thob bo// byang chub sems dpa' bzhi khri brgyad hong ni/ chos kyi khams kyi bzod pa'i pha rol
294a9(mdo): tu phyi dad pa khob ste/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mngon par 'ong du chud do// de'i tshe de'i dus na yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam ka'i snying po la 'di skad ces gsol
294b1(mdo): rigs kyi bu myong ma da lnga 'di legs par bzung gAH/ tshangs gag ces bkalas / byang chub ses pa dpa' rnam ma la la zhi pos 'dug na ces gsas to// bcom ldan 'das mardo das bya
294b2(mdo): si ltar bzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa/ mdo sde 'di'i gyo po ni pa rang pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa bdud kyi yul 'jom pa/ mu stegs kyi dpung dang bcas par zhig pa nyor mongs pa khams
294b3(mdo): cad seld pa/ log par lta ba dang / 'dod pa rnam pa lnga'i 'ching ba grol ba/ khams gsum gyi btson ma dral ba 'khor ba las ba rad cing mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyogs su bsgral pa/ sa bon dam pa'i rgyu skams
294b4(mdo): bas rbad par byed pa/ rkyed ched po pa ros su phyi dang ba drug la mas cig pa gsum gi mug su ton chu ba gis 'phes pa byed pa/ byang chub kyi 'amam
294b5(mdo): theg pa cig tu 'grub par byed pa/ zhes bya bar zung shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' nam ma' 'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
294b6(mdo): sngon 'das pa'i sangs rgyas grangs ma mchis pa sbyang dang dus pa grangs ma mchis pa dang / tshogs dpag tu ma yo ches pa'i nang du/ chos rnam pa sna tshogs dang / dor rnam pa sna tshogs dang / mtshan
294b7(mdo): rnam pa sna tshogs dang / theg pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyang thos da / rol char mang du 'byung ba'i chos de lta bu dang / ngom char mang du 'byung ba'i dor de lta bu dang / ro mtshar mad du byung ba'i mtshan ma de lta bu dang /
294b8(mdo): ngo mtshar mad du byung ba'i theg pa chen po de lta bu ni thos myong ste/ deng zos pa 'di dag bdag rgyun gyi 'chad par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de rtag la/ chos dang dge 'du dad ni 'ag
294b9(mdo): par myi 'gyur te/ khams gsum gyi sems cad rang skye zhing / rang 'gags par gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong dang / chos dang dge 'dun ma mthong bas/ mya ngan las 'das te/
295a1(mdo): 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes brjod do// bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bying gi rlabs kyis khams gsum du bgrod cing so so'i skye bo'i rjes su brnyes te/ mya ngan las 'da'o zhes bla dgas su brjod pa
295a2(mdo): lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na/ bdag cag rnams kyis theg pa brgyad bris sangs rgyas kyi ye shes su chud par skyes bu chen po chos kyi sku thob par bgyi'o// chos
295a3(mdo): kyi khams su btogs pa'i sems can rnams la mdo sde 'di spel bar bgyi'o// bzung zhing 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kha don du 'don par bgyi'o// ji ltar bshad pa bzhin bsgom ste/ dus gcig tu sangs rgyas 'grub
295a4(mdo): bar bgyi'o// byi gtong bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang la las/ bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'ang sa 'das pa'i slad na/ snyigs ma can gi dus su mdo sde 'di gzung
295a5(mdo): su bzung zhing klog gam/ kha don du bgyid dam/ glegs ba ma du yi ker 'dre 'am/ yaM ker 'drir 'jug na/ bsod nams ce ts+ya/ ma zhig thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka las la pa
295a6(mdo): rigs kyi bu ka la las hong gsum gyi hor chen po'i 'jig rter ki khams na/ nor bu ring po che yongs su bkang ste/ sbyin pa bying pas mdo sde 'di'i kyang mi tsam zos pas/ bsod nams dpag tu myed par che'o
295a7(mdo): gang la las 'jig rten kyi ho khams phrag bcu mdor bu rin po che yongs su bkang ste/ sbyin pa byin pa bas/ mdo sde 'di'i glegs bam du byas te/ 'chang ba tsam gyis bsod nams dpag tu myed par che'o//
295a8(mdo): gang ya las phyogs bcu'i 'jig rter gi khams su nor bu rin po tsha yongs su bkang ste/ sbyin pa byir pa bas/ theg pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'di'i nang nas yi ge ka cig ga ma shu log cig 'dri 'am/
295a9(mdo): 'drim 'jug pa de bas kyang bsod nams dpag tu byed par che'o// 'jig rten grangs myed po'i khams su rin po che yongs su bkang he/ sbyor ba byin pa bas kyang / sems zag pa nas mdo sde 'di la shu log
295b1(mdo): gcig klog gam kha don tu byas na/ bsod nams de bas kyang / dpag tu myed par che'o// ho pa 'ams yongs su gang ba'i sems can gyi skyabs byin pa pas/ gang gis sems zag pa nas
295b2(mdo): mdo sde 'di la don tshig gcig gcig shes te/ gzhang la tshig gcig ka la/ shu log gcig gi dod baha dang ra/ bsod pa'i ya dpag du byed par 'o'o// be ci lo byo ma len/ zang zing gi sbyor ba yi/ nyar
295b3(mdo): thos kyi sbyir ba yin te/ tshe dang longs spyod bskyed par zad kyi/ 'khor ba las kyi 'bar ro// theg pa chen po'i chos kyi sbyin pa ni/ sems can rnams kyi byang chub kyi rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / theg pa gsum gi ye
295b4(mdo): shes kyi srog bsdud par byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu mdo lnga 'di so/ ka pa dang / 'chang ba ni sngo sdig can ma rungs po yin na yang dge ba dang ldan pa'o sngo sdug bsngal can yin na yang / pa yongs
295b5(mdo): snod dang ldan 'a'i/ sngon 'ching ba cad mi na tshal pa dang ldan pa/ sngon mags pa yis dayang / bamado// sngod thun ci zhig yin na yang / dani slobam dben
295b6(mdo): du chud pa'o// sngon zag pa dang bcas pa zhig yin na yang zag pa myed pa'o/ ldarnam so la skye za spyod pa car zhig yinan nga'i 'phags pa'i spyod pa dang ldan pa'o// sngon chos lam dpa'ag
295b7(mdo): ba zhig yi ma yang / nga 'i 'phags pa'i las la rud pa'o// sus skye bo'i sus mam semams pa/ mardo ma 'di klog pa dang / 'thang ba'i phyir tho ga'i phags pa'i ye ge mo dang 'dra ma/ sngon na mongs pa can nin
295b8(mdo): na sang da ma do lnga 'di klog pa dang / 'cha ba'i phyim sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dnga'adrab kya nal sa 'dam bcar ro// nes bka' sas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dam pa men pa pos 'di skad ces
295b9(mdo): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa ltar na/ sngon so sa skye bo lags kyang / da ni 'phags pa'i pyod lam dang ldan pa'o// zhes bgyi ba dang / sngon nyon mongs pa can lag
296a1(mdo): ra yang de'i mdo sde 'di klag pa dang / 'chang bas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / 'dra bar mya ngan las 'das pa man no// zhes bya bar tshul khrims zhig pa dang / mtshams ma mchis par spyad pa dang /
296a2(mdo): dam pa'i chos la bskur pa btab pa yang / ci mdo sde 'di klog pa tsam gyis nyon mongs pa spong ste/ mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / 'thun pa zhig lags sam/ don de rig par dka' zhing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das bye
296a3(mdo): brag phyed par baha nad du gsol zhes zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyang legs par zhus pas/ ngas kyang legs par bshad par bya'o// rigs kyi bu sems
296a4(mdo): can thams cad sangs rgyas la mthong ba'i phyir// log par lta ba dang / tshul khrims nyams pa dang / dam pa'i chos la skur pa btab pa yin no/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten du bzhugs pa na/ tshul khrims nyams pa dang /
296a5(mdo): dam pa'i chos la sku rad pa btab pa yod myed do// de ji lta zhe na/ dper dra ma myi gcig la bu gcig pu yod pa de shi nad tu 'ba'aphangs shi/ nga/ sdug na pha yod pa'i tshe na ni nyin mtshan du baha nad cing bslabs
296a6(mdo): bas byas so chog la 'gal ba myed do// bu yang pa la sr-i zhu che ste/ pI nga ka nyan cing nyes pa yong ma byung ngo // re shig dus cig ma pha la ma ring por 'dron du song ba las/ ring du lon te slar ma 'khor
296a7(mdo): ba'i bar du/ bu de'i pha'i ngag brjed nas nyes pa'ang mang du 'byung ngo // pha rol tu lon te slar ma 'khor ba'i phyir pa shi ba skad du brjod de/ dud mo dag byed cing 'ad kyis 'chal tu myed do// mya ngan gyis non te sems
296a8(mdo): hor nas pa'i bsta nad pa yang brjed de/ chos la skur pa dang 'dra bar 'gal bshe dag byed do// pa de rgyun ring po zhig yon nas/ dus gcig lon nas dus gcig na slar khyim du log pa'i tshe/ bu yang shin tu
296a9(mdo): dga' ba dang / tshim pa skyes nas/ sdon pa'i ha nang ngag kyang dran te/ gzungs su bzung nas nyes pa'ang ma byung ngo // pa mthong ba'i phyir/ pa ma shi bar yang yid ches nas/ log par ltung ba can zhes kyang
296b1(mdo): byi bya'o// pa'i bka' bzhid du myi 'gal ba spyad pas/ bskur ba can zhes kyang myi bya ste/ rigs kyi bu dra ma zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o// bu gcig pu shes bya ba ni/ sems can thams cad do// phas
296b2(mdo): baha dad cing bslabs shes bya ba ni/ tshul khrims so// lam ring por song zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa khams gzhan du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gshegs pa'o// pa la ya thor zhes bya ba 'i che 'das
296b3(mdo): zhes brjod pa'o// mya ngad kyis nod pa ni/ sgrib pas bsgribs pa'o// gzungs su myi 'dzind pa'i phyir/ tshul khrims zhig pa'o// shi ba bskal pa brjod pa'i phyir/ sdig pa spyod pa'o// don 'khrul pa'i phyir
296b4(mdo): bskur ba btab pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pas khams gzhan nas slar gshegs te/ sems cad gyis mthong ba ni/ sangs rgyas mya ngan las myi 'das par yid ches pa'o// sangs rgyas kyis chos
296b5(mdo): ba he rang nas/ sems kyi rang bzhin slar rnyed pas/ tshul khrims kyi nyams pa'o// mya ngan las myi 'da' bar shes pa ni snung/ ba myed pa'o// ba ha nad pa dang / mye 'gal bar spyod cing don shes
296b6(mdo): ba ni chos la gyi skur pa yim do// rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di sa ka ba dang / 'cha pa de 'khor ba mangs myed pa'i nyor yongs pa ldini lci ba kun 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gang la do sde 'do thos pa'i sangs
296b7(mdo): rgyas kyi mtshar thos pa'o// gang mdo sde 'di ma thong ba 'i sangs rgyas kyi zhal mthong ba'o// gang mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa'i/ sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dzind pa'o// gang mdo sde 'di spyod pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa myor pa
296b8(mdo): gang mdo lnga 'di bshad pa yid/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgad do/ gang mdo sde 'di 'o shes pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi don shes pa'o// gsangs rgyas kyi mdzang pa spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi don legs par
296b9(mdo): brel ba de de/ nyor mongs pa btad myed par 'gyur ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhes/ mdo sde 'di lag tu 'ongs pa'i phyir/ nyon mongs pa yongs su spang bar 'gyur ba'o// rigs kyi bu bskal pa brkyang khril nyir zhag
297a1(mdo): gcig tu brtsi ba/ zhag gsum bcu zla ba cig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo bcu gcig tu bsgres pa'i bskal pa brgya hong bye ba khrag khrig 'das pa la sangs rgyas gcig 'byung ba dang phrad do// yang
297a2(mdo): bskal pa grangs de dang 'dra ba 'das nas/ sangs rgyas gcig 'byung ba dang phrad kyang / mdo sde 'odi dang 'phrad pa shin tu dkon no// gang mdo sde 'di dang phrad po ni/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gi sangs rgyas
297a3(mdo): thams cad phrad pa dang 'dra'o// de'i phyir blo dang ldan pas mdo sde 'di blang ba dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kha don tu 'dod pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / gzhan la yang bstan na log
297a4(mdo): par lta ba dang / ma rig pa'i nyon mongs pa dang / zag pa dang / bcas pa'i sdig pa yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi zhing la gnas par 'gyur/ 'jig rten gi mchod yod dpag tu
297a5(mdo): myed pa yang 'ju bar 'gyur/ nam mkho'i snying pos gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten gyi yon 'ju ba skad myi gdal na so so skye bo lta zhig yon 'ju bar
297a6(mdo): 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rang sangs rgyas yon myi 'ju myi srid de/ sems can la chos bshad ba bsgral bar myi nus na yang / bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin
297a7(mdo): la 'jug pas/ ting nge 'dzin la langs te/ rdzu 'phrul chen po rnam par spruld cing / sems can rnams bsgral bar byed par mchod yon 'ju bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa'
297a8(mdo): nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'das mdo sde kha cig las byung ba lta log pa dang / tshul khrims zhig pa rnams khams gcig tu lhan cig gnas su yang myi rung ba dang / chu klung
297a9(mdo): gcig la chab 'tshal du yang myi rung ba dang / gso sbyong kyi tshe gang zag de 'phags pa'i lam stor ba lags te/ dge 'dun gyi nang du'ang myi 'chud ces 'byung ra/ ji'i slad du deng 'dir tshul khrims zhig pa rnams
297b1(mdo): kyang mchod yon 'ju bar 'gyur zhes gsungs/ gal te de dag mchod yon 'ju bar 'gyur na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang yang bamyi dpal 'phags pa dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas pas 'da' ba 'drar//
297b2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das de tsam zhig bye brag byed par bshad par smod/ bdag kyang de bos ras de bzhin du sems can rnams la bsta nad par bgyi'o// rnam par grol bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub las
297b3(mdo): dpal nam yukha'i snying po la bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyed las stsogs pa re 'dir byams pa dang / snying rje phur gsum tshogs par ldan pas/ sems can rnams la snying rtse bar ba
297b4(mdo): don de lu ba de rab tu'ang legs te/ ngas kyang bye zag byed par bshad kyis/ legs pa'i sems la nyon cig/ chos kyi nas sa 'di'i spyod yul mi// nyan thos dang / rang byang chub rnams
297b5(mdo): kyis rig par yang kyi 'gyur la/ bdud dang mu stegs dang / mas skye bo rnams kyi khams pa'i gnas kyang ma yin te/ sangs rgyas la khyend pa dang / khyod kyi 'ong du chud par zad do//
297b6(mdo): rigs kyi bu ngas rtag tu byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams la stan pa/ sems can bzang nga rnam par gyi rtog par byin pa byas bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su 'grub bo das bshad de/ byol
297b7(mdo): mong la sbyin pa byin pas / bsod rnams kyi yon tan brgya thob par 'gyur/ log spyod la sbyir pa byin pas ni/ bsod nams kyi yon tan stong phob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dge ba'i rtsa brgyan 'chad pa'i/
297b8(mdo): ma tsham mayog spyod kyi chung du 'grodrin gyi gso ba dang / zhes myed pa de 'tsho'i pos / byom mo gi chung du 'gyu'o// son khyod kyi zas shurnas par sbyi pa yangasasod rnams can gyi yod 'gyur
297b9(mdo): mdo sde 'di klog pa dang / 'chang ba'i gang bka lta zhig ce smos/ de bas na theg pa chen po'i mdo lnga pa rang ba chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i mthu dang byed kyis rlabos bsam gyis kyi khyab bo// tshul khrims
298a1(mdo): pa dang / mtshams myed par 'gro ba dang / dam pa'i chos la bskur pa dang / log par lta ba dang / nyon mongs pa can gyi sdig pa yongs su 'byang bar byed pas ma/ mchod yor yang 'ju bar nus so//
298a2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' dam la la'i snying pos gsos pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'ang bsas kyis kyi khyab/ b.rad pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i sacu dang / byin kyi rnabs
298a3(mdo): bsam gyis myi khyab/ mdo 'di 'dzind pa dang / klog pa'i gang zag de'i yon tan yang bsam gyis myi khyab bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// khyod kyis
298a4(mdo): bshad pa bzhin te/ yon tan bsam gyis myi khyab pa mthal yas pa thob par 'gyur ro// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal da/
298a5(mdo): ngas drar pa sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba ra/ nga de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyi sa la mchod pa phul te bsnyen bkur byas na yang / nyan thos kyi
298a6(mdo): tshul gyi tshul du spyod pas/ nyes sbyor yang du 'byung ba dang / tshul khrims nyams pa dpag tu myed pa dag 'byung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis pal lung bstand par ma gyurd to// bskal pa
298a7(mdo): de 'das nas/ bskal pa ma 'ong bar mos pa zhes bya ba la/ bde'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bzhi 'ju ga mchod pa yul te/ bsnyen du bkur byas na yang / sangs rgyas de dag gis pa la lung ma bsta nad to// bskal
298a8(mdo): pa de 'das nas yang bskal pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba na nga de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa gnyis la mchod pa phul te/ bsnyen bkur byas na yang / sangs rgyas de dag gis nga la lung ma bstan to//
298a9(mdo): bskal pa de 'das nas yang bskal pa sems dga' zhes bya ba na/ nga de'i tshe sangs rgyas brgyad khri bzhi stong la mchod pa phul te/ bsnyen bkur byas na yang / sangs rgyas de dag gis pa la lung ma bstan to/
298b1(mdo): bskal pa de 'das nas yang bskalang pa sdug bsngal skyabs shes bya ba dang / 'jig rten rnam par brgya dad pa zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyed
298b2(mdo): pa rapa zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyend pa skyes su 'dus pa'i la so spyar ba/ zla la myed pa lha dang kyi rnams kyi sto ra pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa chen po zhes bya ba 'thung
298b3(mdo): pa de'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bzhi bcu la/ mchod pa phul te bsnyen bkur byas nas/ gdod mdo sde 'di'i myong thos te/ nyor mongs pa la yongs su spangs kyis kyang / mdo sde 'di da dung ma pa ste/ nga de'i tshe de
298b4(mdo): dus ra/ mchod pa'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs bstsags te/ mchod pa phul na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang bal lung bstand par ma gyur to// rigs kyi bu po bskal pa
298b5(mdo): steng du sangs rgyas de snyed la mchod pa de snyed cig phul bad/ 8/ bsnyen bkur dang / bkod pa byas nas/ nyon mongs parnam par spangs te/ nyan thos kyi sdom pa dang tshul phur kasum
298b6(mdo): tshogs pa/ tshangs par pyad cing / spyir ba byin pa dang / tshul khrims bslabs pa dang / nga rgyal dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug speng ste/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan spyod pa dang / bzod pa dang byams pa
298b7(mdo): sems dang / ji ltar zos pa bzhin brtson 'grus su bshad pa dang / thos so cog thams cad kyi brjed pa dang / 'du 'dzi spang ste/ dper ba la gnas pa dang / bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzi rang la 'jug
298b8(mdo): pa dang / bsam gtan las 'byung na// chos nyan pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du 'dor pa dang / bsam pa las stsogs pa byas kyang / rgyal ba de dag gis pa la lung ma bsta dang to// de ci'i phyir/
298b9(mdo): ler/ sdom pa ros so cog 'jigs pa dang / nyams pa sang du 'byung ba'i phyir ro// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi leg pa la chags pa'i phyir ro// theg pa chen po'i yi do sde pa rad pa chen po phyogs
299a1(mdo): su rgyas pa la bos pa'i phyir ro// de bas na byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam yang bar bya/ theg pa chen po'i mdo sde ba rad pa chen po
299a2(mdo): phyogs su rgyas pa bsgom par bya na/ lung ba nyan pa thob par 'gyur ro// gal te ngas bskal pa gcig nas/ bskal pa gcig gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi mtshan bshad pa na/ yang rdzogs par myi nus te/ rigs kyi
299a3(mdo): bu pa bskal pa de dag 'das pa'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od myi 'gyur gyis/ tshogs chen po dpag tu myed pa la/ theg pa chen po'i mdo sde thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa
299a4(mdo): de mtho bdas/ ba de'i tshe de'i dus na gdod thos pa dang / mthong bar 'gyur ro// rgyal ba de las langs ste/ 'dzind pa dang / klog pa dang kha ton bya ba dang / don bsam pa la stsogs pa byas
299a5(mdo): de ma bag chos la myi skye ba'i bzod pa thob bo// de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa 'od myi 'gyur gyis pa la lung bstand pa/ khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
299a6(mdo): rdzogs pa la sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// zhes lung bsta dngad to// de bas na rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blangs te/ 'chang ba dang klog pa las bsdogs pa byas na/
299a7(mdo): sangs rgyas kyis su myur du 'thob par 'gyur du/ 'jig rtemad lha dang phyir bcam pa'i mchod yon 'du bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir/ ngas theg pa chen po'o chos kyi nam grangs ki mthu sto
299a8(mdo): rid pa mo'i snyim po dang 'an pa/ bsum gyis kyi thub pa tshul khrims 'jig pa dang / dbus yongs pa rnams kyi lus dang / rin tsha'i no bu sbyin par byed pa skye bstan patshigs su bcad pa brjod pa
299a9(mdo): bya'o// theg che dpel chang rgyal mo bzhis/ reg pa chung du ba rjes su theg yes dpal chad ri rab spun/ reg la chung ngu chog ma'i sa 'am/ thog chen dpal ched gti zla bzhin// theg pa chung ngu me ha/
299b1(mdo): nam theg pa 'di'i mig chen yin/ bsam gyis kyi khyab leg pa'o// dper na nam lakha' dang 'dra ba/ sems can thams cad go 'byed do// theg pa thams cad kun gyi rang / theg pa 'di las 'dal ba myed/ thes/
299b2(mdo): pa chen po 'di nang nas/ theg pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung / dpag pa'i grangs shig yod da ni/ thams cad bsgral bar myi nus so// theg pa bla na myed pa 'di sems can yongs su bsgral phyi nus nam mkhal 'dra
299b3(mdo): ba'i mig chen la/ gang gis bdag kyang 'di spyod pa/ ram ma'a' dpag tu myed pa 'azhin/ gzugs kyang dbyibs kyang yod byed do// theg pa chen po de bzhin te/ bogs pa skyed cing dpag tu byed/ sems can thams cad
299b4(mdo): de dag kur theg pa chen po de bzhin la/ theg pa'i mtshan la rnam rtog/ ra/ gtos rgya che zhing yang du shong/ gas te reg chen yon tan dang / theg pa gcig tu spyod pa 'i/ bskal pa dpag myed rab bshad
299b5(mdo): kyang / mabar du brdzogs par yod kyi nus/ theg pa thams cad du/ na gyi nang / theg pa chen po dam pa mchog sems lag theg chen 'di/ blangs na/ byang chub shing drung mngon par 'gro/ 'ching ba
299b6(mdo): myed cing logs myed pa/ za ra myed pa'i theg pa 'di/ theg pa dmam pa'i ma chog 'gyur bas/ byang chub dkyil du 'dug par 'ong/ rten 'bres bcu gnyis rnam brtags te/ sems can rnams la bsnying rtse
299b7(mdo): phyir/ phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad la/ pheg chen mdo sde bshad par bya/ gang zhig theg med theg pa ni/ 'phel ba 'am 'grib pa yod myed de/ ram yakhal bzhin du kun shong bas// theg pa chen po bsam
299b8(mdo): kyi khyag der phyir sems cad thams cad kyis/ brtson 'grus su ni bskom bya ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang ni/ ye shes chen po lob par bya/ lha'i tshogs dang lha'i bdud// mu stegs nyor mongs sem
299b9(mdo): 'dod pa/ theg pa chen po la skyebs song la/ mngor shes drug dang ldan par byos/ rig pa gsum dang rnam parang gsum/ des di bdud dang mu stegs 'jom log par lta 'ang bcil pas da/ theg
300a1(mdo): pa chen po mchog tu dgos/ nyon mongs thams cad 'jig pa dang / dge ba phun gsum tshogs 'gyur ba/ theg chen mthu ni bsam myi khyab/ de bas dpag pa 'ang rab tu dkal/ 'jig rten pa'i
300a2(mdo): chos rnams dang / 'jig rten 'das pa'i chos thams cad/ slob dang kyi slob de dag kus/ theg pa chen por kun 'dus so// sems can gang zhig ngar 'gror spyod pa yi/ log par lta ba dang ni sdig 'grogs
300a3(mdo): bsten/ gang zhig theg pa chen po ma dad pa/ des ni nyon mongs bdud rnams 'jom myi nus/ de rnams spangs te theg ce na skyabs song ba/ grol b.rad 'dod pas theg pa chen po slob skyes bu gang zhig don
300a4(mdo): rkyen shes 'dod pas/ theg ce na bshad pa thos na dga' ba skye/ de ni theg rten myi ni yin par mngon// zhi gnas sems ni mngon par shes dang ldan de yang theg chen dbang gyis rnam par brgyan
300a5(mdo): gang zhig theg pa chen por spyod nus na/ de ni dkon mchog gsu/ ma gyi rigs myi 'chad/ gang zhig dkon mchog gsum la phyogs/ pa ni/ de ni bsod nams dpag myed thob pa'o// phyogs
300a6(mdo): bcu'i 'jig rten khams su phyi dad pa dang / phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba dpag myed mchod pa dang / de bzhin theg chen phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo/ mchod na 'jig rten theg pas thub pa myed
300a7(mdo): dpal dang gzi brjid ldan zhing 'khor ba 'jom de'i phyir theg pa chen po bsams khyab dka'/ byad gzugs stobs dang dbang phyug thob par 'gyur/ phun gsum tshogs ldan chos sku mngon par 'grub
300a8(mdo): gang zhig theg cher 'di la zhon pa ni/ bla myed pa'i dga' ba myong ba yin/ lus kyi sbyin pas snying rje byams bsgoms ra/ de phyir theg pa za myed thob par 'gyur/ tshul khrims brtson 'grus tshangs par
300a9(mdo): spyod pa ni/ rdzu 'phrul mngon du gnyi zla ba sgrib kyang nus de yang theg chen spyod pa'i dbang gyis so// rang gi sems kyis brtson 'grus rgyun spyod pa'o// sdug bsngal non pa'i sgrib pa yod na yang
300b1(mdo): theg chen bsgoms pas de dag kur kyang 'byang/ gang zhig theg chen chos sa bde gnas pa/ don che dang longs spyod sangs rgyas bzhin/ yang dag dram pa bson par ldan pa di/ rdzu 'phrul rkam pa bzhi'i hobs
300b2(mdo): krung rnyed / dam chos yang dag don sa nyen pa dang / theg pa chen po bsgom pa'i dbang byis so// kyi 'jigs dang ni stobs bcu dang ldan pa dang / mtshan 'bang sum bcu rtsa gnyis bgyur ba dang / rdo rje ti pa'i 'dzin
300b3(mdo): yeshes khams cad kyang / theg pa chen po bsgoms pa'i dbang gyis mo// rigs kyi bu gangs sas theg pa ma mchos kyi rnams mangs 'di 'azung ste/ 'bru cig gam/ tshig gam tshigs bshad gcig 'chang das/
300b4(mdo): klog yas sod nams 'di lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur krung zhen 'dis ste/ gang gis mdo lnga 'di 'dzi dadang pa sdug bsngas kun dang yong zas so// nam du'ang ngan 'gror gyi srung ste/ bde la
300b5(mdo): gnas su phyi dad par 'gyur/ gang gis mardo lnga 'di las pam yongs dus pad ma/ mang 'dusangs rgyab 'i grub par 'gyur/ ngas ni lung du bta dad par bya/ kang kyis rgyal sa taka na na/
300b6(mdo): ba rgyal ba 'ang rtag tu de la gzhol/ gang gis rgyal po'i chos bsrungs so// rgyal ba 'ang de la bsrung bar 'gyur/ rdzu 'phrul chen po thob pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar nus/ 'khor rgyud las bla sprul pa dang /
300b7(mdo): bdud kyi dpung bcas 'jil yang rus/ rgyal ba 'od myi 'gyur de las/ ngas mi mdo lnga 'di thos na/ bzod par gnas de sung ba han bshag kya thub ces bya bar grub/ padi mya ngan 'das 'og ra
300b8(mdo): ka zhig mdo sde 'di 'chang ba/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba rangs kyang yung du be ha nang bar bya/ gad kyis la 'ongs dus kyi/ mdo sde 'di dod shes te/ blun po rnams la rab bshad pa
300b9(mdo): dkor mchog gsum kyi rigs kyi 'chad/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi zhugs kyang / ma do 'di 'jig rten gang na bar/ gnas pa'i mchog gnas de dag tu/ sangs rgyas mngon gsum bzhugs pa mdzis
301a1(mdo): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngas de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu myed pa las/ mdo sde 'di mnos te/ 'chang ba dang / bskal pa 'jig pa'i tshe/ gzhan la rgya cher bshad pas na mtshan sum bcu rtsa
301a2(mdo): gnyis kyang de ltar thob bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang skyes bu chen po'i
301a3(mdo): mtshan sum brtsa gnyis bshad/ deng 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis bshad na/ lus kyi rgyu gang gi dbang gis de dag 'grub par 'gyur ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bskabs dbye
301a4(mdo): zhing bstand tu gsol da/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ yon tan dpag tu myed pa bsgrubs pas/ mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis 'grub pa yin te/ gal te
301a5(mdo): ngas rgya tshar bshad pa bskal pa'i bar du yang bshad pa myi rdzog/ sa par/ der mdo tsam zhig khyod la bshad do// de dag gang zhe na// 'di lta ste/ sems thag pa nas tshul khrims dag par
301a6(mdo): bsrung ba dang / yid dam la brtan pas/ zhabs shin tu ka na pa'i mtshan dang / ldan par 'gyur ba dang / tha ma la bsu bsgyel nga/ chos nyan pa dang / gtsug lag khang dang / mchod
301a7(mdo): rten bsgrub pa la phud dud du byas pas/ phyag dpa' bas 'khor lo'i mtshan rtsibs stong dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad la ma rnyas pas/ rting pa yangs pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur
301a8(mdo): ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrung bas/ sor mo ring po'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / bsdu ba rnam bzhi goms par byas pas/ phyag dang zhabs dra bar sor mo bar 'brel pa'i mtshan dang ldan
301a9(mdo): bar 'gyur ba dang / kos bzang po sbyir ba kyi pas phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / bza' ba dang btung ba zhim po dang gtsang ma dang nyams su bde ba byin pas
301b1(mdo): bdun shin tu mtho ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la zos par dka' bas/ mi dgas e de sa'i byin pa lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / gzhan gyi g.yo mtshang sbed cing /
301b2(mdo): bcas pas gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba bcu bsgoms pas/ ser ge'i ro tod lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs te/
301b3(mdo): sems can la rtag tu btod pas/ phrag so shin tu rgyas pa'i mtshan dang ldan dang bar 'gyur ba dang / 'jigs pa rnams kyi makon dang skyabs byas pas/ phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par 'grub pa'i mtshan dang ldan
301b4(mdo): bar 'gyur ba dang / gzhan gyis gtsug lag khapangam/ ma da rten bsgrub pa'i grogs byed par mos pa dang / slong ba rnams la bdog pa myed ces byas pas/ phyag brlal drang por lus
301b5(mdo): mo'i lha nga la slebs pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang rtag tu dge ba'i chos thams cad bsgrub pa dang / srog gi rim gro byas pas sku che zhing drang ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang
301b6(mdo): ra ba rnams la rtsi sma dang dang / rim 'gro dang nyams su phar pa'i zas byin pas/ ro bro ba'i mchog thob pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / yun ring pos nas tshig 'khyal ba spangs shing / dus su smra bas
301b7(mdo): seng ge'i 'grel ba lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad la sems mnyam par snyoms pas/ sems rnams 'ang ba'i bcu tshang ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / bzod
301b8(mdo): pa rnams bsdum pa la dgal bas tshems lags bzang ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / ring po che sbyir byas pas/ tshems mnyal ba'i mtshan dang ldan bar 'gyur ba dang / lus dang ngag dang yang ljo
301b9(mdo): su dag pas tshoms shin tu dkar ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / ngag gi nges pa bsdams paso/ ljags shin tu yangs shing srab pa'i mtshar dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams la
302a1(mdo): rtag tu tshig 'jam po smra bas/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / byams pa'i sems bsgoms te/ rmongs pa myed pa'i myig gis lta bas/ spyan dkar dag 'byes pa'i mtshan
302a2(mdo): dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sems zag pa nas bla na myed pa'i byang chub tu bsgrubs pas/ ba'i rdzi ma lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / gzhan la bsod nams dang / yon tan yod pa rjes su yi rang
302a3(mdo): zhing bsdabs pas/ zhal mdzod spus brgya dad pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / pha ma dang mkhan po dang / slob dpon las bstsogs pa'i bla ma rnams la/ tshul bzhin du rim 'gro dang / btsun par byas pas
302a4(mdo): dbu spyid gtsug dang ldan pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / theg pa chen po'i chos bstand pa la mos pas/ mdog shin tu 'jam pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / stand dang / gos dang /
302a5(mdo): khang pa dang gnas bzang po byan pas/ gser gyi kha dog dang lnga/ na ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rte nang ki gta chog/ sa he smra ba spangs pas/ ba spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyin
302a6(mdo): pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / mkhan po dang bla ma rnams kyis bstand po'i tshig/ yang dag par blangs pa dang / bzung ba dang / mngon du spel zhing 'grib par ma byas pas/ yan
302a7(mdo): lag gi spu gyed du 'khyil ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / yon tan dpag tu myed par bsgrubs pas/ zhabs legs par mtho ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams ting nge 'dzin
302a8(mdo): bsgoms par bskul bas/ shing n+ya gro ltar chu zheng gab pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ de ltar dpag tu myed pa'i yon tan smrabs na/ mtshan
302a9(mdo): sum bcu rtsa gnyis de lta bu dag ldan par 'gyur ro// zhes de skad bka' stsal da nas/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsold to// bco mo ldan 'das

303a8(mdo): skye ba ma mchis/ 'gag pa ya mchis/ skom du ma mchis/ spyad du ma mchis/ dor du ma mchi sa~M// blang du ma mchis/ mthal las 'das te/ yun du bzhugs pa la gang gi slad du myod lam rgya cher

303b1(mdo): 'das pa'i dus da/ sangs rgyas grangs kyid dpag tu byed pa rnams la bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsku dang ba/ sun ring po nas theg pa cher po bran myed pa'i don chub par chud de/ chos so cog kun kyang ston/
303b2(mdo): pa nyid du mngor bar shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag pa'i mthal las 'das te/ sun tu gnas par yang shes pas/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta he/ dper na/ rin po tsa s+ye du r+ya'i dor bu shin tu dang

303b7(mdo): mod kyi/ don dam par yi ge sred kyang / kun rdzob tu yi ge yod par bshad pas/ sems cadan la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid dang bra na byed pa'i byang chub yang yi ge ya las kud na yang gyi rnyed do// rigs
303b8(mdo): kyi bu thod zer ba 'ang badred te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang zad bkyed/ skye bgyid/ phyi bsgom gyi spyod/ nom gyod rnams dang bral ba yang dag pa'i chos la kyi 'jug/ de las log cing 'gyur
303b9(mdo): 'ang ma yin/ skye ba cig gis dga' ldan gyi gnas su yang ma skyes/ de las babs te yum gyi lhu mos su yang ma gnas/ chos thams cad la sems kyi gnas pas/ padi skye dka' na
304a1(mdo): las 'das so zhes kyang ma byas phyogs bzhir gom pa bdun bdun yang ma bor/ nga ni 'jig rten na bla na myed pa'i btsun pa yin no// zhes ma brjod/ grong khyer mchog tun cung ma bzang mo dang ma
304a2(mdo): brtser/ 'jig rten gi bya ba yi ge rtsis las brtsegs pa yang ma bslabs/ stobs dang phong rtsal yang ma bskrun/ sems can yongs su mya ngan las bzla' ba'i phyir/ rgan po mngon sum du ba ha nad pa ni
304a3(mdo): lus la chags pa rnams bkag go/ nad pa mngon gsum bstan pa ni/ tshe la chags pa rnams bkag pa'o// shi ba'i mtshan ma la mngon gsum du bstan pa ni/ 'dod chags dang / da dang nga'i re 'dzin da
304a4(mdo): pa rnams bkag pa'o// dge slong mngon gsum du bstan pa ni/ sems can rnams tshangs pa dang / brgya byin gyi lus myi nyon par 'jig rten las 'das pa/ bla na myed pa'i chos la brtson

304a8(mdo): pa'o// ka sha dur smig gyod pa ni/ sems can 'dul bar bsta nad pa'o// drang srong su ta ka dang / a ran ta las chos 'dri rtog bya ba ni rang gyi nga rgyal gyi sems 'joms par ba ha nad pa'o// lo drug gi
304a9(mdo): bar du dka' bub kyang pa ni/ mu stegs 'dul ba'o// zhal zas blangs pa ni/ 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o// pra sa hi ka bslangs pa ni cho ga shes par ba ha nad pa'o// rtswa bti

306a3(mdo): skyabs kyi dbang du gyu rad pas na/ seng ge'i sgra zhes bya'o// de ltar bstan nas/ ljags kyi mtshan rgya chen pos hong gsum gyi hod chen po'i khams kund khyebs par g.yogs 'das/ 'jig rtend kyi khams khams

306a6(mdo): ste/ phyogs bcur snang ba chen por byas so// snang ba chen po des myi rtag pa ni rtag par byas/ ma drug pa ni dag par byas/ sdug bsngal can ni bde bar byas/ ma rig pa ni rig par byas so//

306a8(mdo): dman myed par mnyam par 'gyur te/ nyal nyil dang / sngan ljin byed de/ kun kyang yongs su dag par gyur nas/ 'di lta ste/ dper na shar phyogs la 'jig rten zla kang nam dag yongs su brgyad dang 'dra'o/
306a9(mdo): da'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das shag kya bub pa'i sku sprul pa ni/ nam mkha' nas bas pas ni/ mye tog gi char bab pa dang 'dra/ sa 'og nas byung ba ni sprin dang na bun 'byung ba dang / 'dra bar nam
306b1(mdo): na yongs su ga / rnam mkha' ho pazung bar kyang byed do// sprus po 'i rnam pa sonam/ rtsig sathun par ngo 'a' gshenas pa ni rtag par 'tsho skyo ba zhing gzhes te/ mya ngan las kyi 'anga'o// sems can khams
306b2(mdo): dang / sa gsu bshad do nas gsu sa redag gi rgyu nam man pa ga gas byud pa las sems can gamig pa gsus du / sa
306b3(mdo): ras de sa lag tu kun gyi snang bar gyur das/ bcom ldan 'das yangan sa bzhugs pa nyi ma ldang nye/ rdo'i mchogs yang ba thams cad kyis sku sprul pa de dag mthong bas/ bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa'i byin kyis
306b4(mdo): kyisasu / sub pa sang byams pa/ di rdu phrul dang / 'a par smras pa 'a phags kyibyang chub sems dpa' gang ka'i thung bani tshu kyil na
306b5(mdo): kyi sa / rnams brdzu nan ma ma las byu nga/ na pa mas sur// dag bcom pa'i #/ dge sangs
306b6(mdo): kun gyi gyi 'ong / ban lu sa zag cun / rgyu spya spags pa
306b7(mdo): lha dang kyi grangs myed pa zhig ni chos kyig rdul myed pa/ dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag sa ma za / rang shin gyi shes pa dang / 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad kyi rtag par mo bong ngo // de nas tshogs kyi nang
306b8(mdo): ras byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ming ge'o// sangs te/ dz+nyA nam zag pa cig du banas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'bas sa spyi los gzugs te phyug 'tshas nas/ bcom ldar
306b9(mdo): 'das la 'di gad ces gsolang to/ ma ldan 'das shing du bstan pa margyas kyis ngan mamam pa ljin pa kyim ca seMm pa rdzog 'byung / dge 'dun
307a1(mdo): zom yang sdig byang bar 'gyur ro// zhes 'bru pa sangs rgyas kyisathu lags sam/ chos kyim thu lags sas/ dge 'dun gyi mthu lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi mgu lags yan/ sangs/
307a2(mdo): rgyas la gsol par bgyi/ chos kyi mthu lags a ni/ chos la gsol par bgyi/ dge 'dun gyi mthu lags na ni/ dge 'dun la gsol par bgyi ba lags na/ gsum char la gsol par bgyid
307a3(mdo): cing 'tshal/ gong nas gsungs pa theg pa cig la/ so so'i skye bos rnam gsum du mthong ngo zhes 'byung na/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis kyang / gsum du bshad na/ sems can lta zhig ci smos shes
307a4(mdo): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po seng gye'i sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsalapa/ to// legs so legs rigs kyi bu sems can la phar
307a5(mdo): ba dang bde ba'i phyir/ don de lta bu 'dri ba yang shi nad tu egs te/ nyon cig ngas khyod la bye brag phyed par bshad do// sangs rgyas kyi mthu 'ba' shig kyang ma yin/ chos kyi mthu
307a6(mdo): 'ba' shig kyang ma yin/ dge 'dund gi mthu 'ba' shig kyang mo yin te/ kun tshogs pa'i mthu 'as/ sangs rgyas ni sems can mgon skyabs kyi pha ya/ byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i
307a7(mdo): bshes gnyen yin no// sems can bslad pa can sems stor ba slar rnyed de la lto ba la skyo nas// dram pa'i mthu mang pos 'ams gsum na/ nyon mongs po'i rgya mtsho las bsgral bar 'dod na phyogs
307a8(mdo): su rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'dis bsgral ba'o/ gru chen po byed do// de bas na rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyang chos so// chos kyang dge 'dudad do// dge 'dun da ni 'dus ma byas pa'o// 'dus ma byas pa
307a9(mdo): ni stong pa nyid de/ 'dus ma byas pa'i stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas kyi stong pa nyid dang / rang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / chung ngu'i stong pa nyid kyang / hong
307b1(mdo): ba nyid du 'dra ste/ de las gzhan myed do// rigs kyi bu khyod zer ba sa ltar/ rnam pa gcig tu bsgrug pa tshogs kyi rnam pa gsum du bsgrub cing dgongs shes bya ba de/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/
307b2(mdo): dper na/ myi cig cig nam mkha' hor pas skrag te/ kar phyi red kar gab kyang nam mkha' dang yong ma bralta'i / rigs kyi bu phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa dang / ngas bshad do cog
307b3(mdo): dge ba thams cad kyi sku rkyen dang / dkon mchog gsum dang / reg pa ka stsal yang cig sas kyi zhang 'o// byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i sgras gsol pa/ legs so// legs so// bcom ldan 'das la
307b4(mdo): dang bsti da/ bdag ldanas 'amasas pa rnams kyi ma / da dus pas 'das kyis bka' sa yad / nan du rgya
307b5(mdo): so// phyogs su rgyas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'did sa ngas rgyas kyi yum byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shus chen po/ rnam 'byor pa rnams kyi myig he/ lta ba log pa rnams srung
307b6(mdo): pa dang / sems stor pa rnams sbyong ba dang / ngan song ga ma gi ni gcod pa dang / thanam mchis pa'i byang chub kyi rdo 'byed dang / nyan thos rnams zlog te/ theg pa chen por 'dzud pa'i
307b7(mdo): du bdag gis gzungs chen mo'i sngags kyis bsrung zhing bskyab par bgyi'o// sdom pa la nyams pa dang mdo sde 'dis sgom zhing bslab par bgyid pa de la yang bsrung zhing / bskyab par bgyi'o// gal te ga
307b8(mdo): zag gangs las mdo sde 'di la bsnyenang bkur bgyi tsong / dgung bdud kyi bar du gyur pa myod pa la bdud sdig cadan kyis 'azhug cing 'tshe ba'i glags lta ba ma mchis shA/ bdud sdig can gyis klas
307b9(mdo): kyi skabs kyi rnyed par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag yado sde 'di la rim 'gro bgyis ste/ yun ring por gnas par bgyi ba yang / byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du bgyi'o// bcom
308a1(mdo): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod mdo sde 'di la rim 'gro bya ba ni/ dkon mchog gsum la rim 'gro bya ba dang / 'dra'o// ho nad pa la rim 'gro bya ba dang / 'dra'o// de nas byang chub
308a2(mdo): sems dpa' seng ge'i sgras/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gzungs sngags 'di skad ces smras so// na mo bud d+ha ya/ na mo dar ma ya/ na mo sar ka ya/ a dan d+he/ da ra naM/ ta ba hA sa ga sha ni swa ba ba sa
308a3(mdo): dar ma ni/ swa ba baM/ i sha ma d+ha bi bA sha ra/ bi me la su ba re/ dar la i di ke na/ pa la de l+yA ya ba/ mA le tsA le tsA le/ hu lu hU lu/ she bI shi dai man dra yan tra swa hA/ sngags 'di duso cig la lan brgya rtsa brgya
308a4(mdo): bzlas shing mchod rten lang bdun bskur bar bgyi de ltar gdu gas bdun kye bar du mdo sde gzhan la mye bsam par gdugs cig kyang / dus gsum du phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo 'di la sems rtse tsog bgyi
308a5(mdo): ste/ sems gzhan du myi g.yeng bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzungs sngags 'di ni/ sangs rgyas khri phrag brgyad brgyas gsung / sa pa ste/ deng 'dir bdag gis kyang / brjod pa logs so//
308a6(mdo): gal te 'ga' zhig gzungs 'di la smod pa mchis pa/ sangs rgyas de dag la smod par 'gyur ro// gzungs 'di la smod pa de tshe rabs du mo'i b.radu byang chub tu bsgrubs kyang / 'grub par myi 'gyur te/ srid
308a7(mdo): pa gsum las kyang myi 'da'o// de tsa'i slad du zhe na/ sngags 'di sems dran pa nyams pa rnams sems slar rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / gzungs 'di lan cig tsam nar thos sam/ thos nas yi ger bris te/
308a8(mdo): sha dang chang mye 'tshal bar sdom pa la ka nas shing / bdag nyid rtse 'jos la sogs pa spang ste/ 'du 'jo'i nang du mya 'jug la/ rgyun du byams pa chen po pyod cing / bsam gtan la gces par 'dzin dan
308a9(mdo): gang zag de dpag tu ma mchis pa'i sgrib pa gsum kyi sdig lci ba rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzungs 'di 'os la lag tu sems zag pa das blang ba dang / bcang ba dang / nyin re zhing klog pa dang / kha don tu
308b1(mdo): bgyid pa dang / yid dam du myi bgyid pa bgyid na/ gang zag de mngon par byang ma chub kyi bar du ngan song gsum du ltung bar myi 'gyur ro// zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpal seng
308b2(mdo): ke'i sgra la bkal stsal pa/ legs so lags so// rigs kyi bu khyod dkon mchog gsum gau rim 'gro bya ba dang / byams pa'i sems byis sems can rnams srid pa gsum las gdod pa dang / bslab
308b3(mdo): mang po mangs myed pa la phan pa dang / bde ba chen po bya ba'i phyir ston pa'i sgo 'byed cing / log par lta ba rnams bzlog te/ yang dag par lta ba la 'dud pa'i phyir// gzungs sngags 'di bshad pa shin du'ang leg sa
308b4(mdo): rigs kyi bu sems can thams cad khyod kyi mying dang / sngags kyi sgra pos dras dad pa dang / gus pa bskyed de kyi spod na/ gang zag de 'di nyid layang bde/ 'chi 'phos ma yang rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong
308b5(mdo): zhing / pa yang ma 'ong sa khyod las 'tshogs pa byang chub sems dkyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// mngon par 'ang rgyu bar nges par ra gis rig ste/ ye tsom byed do// kun nam nyon mongs pa spangs
308b6(mdo): ba dang / dge ba kun gyi lam bsgrubs te/ sangs rgyas rab ba zhen mthong ba yang / rnam dag dad pa'i dbang gis so// yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' saHyad to// mya ngan las 'das pa
308b7(mdo): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las nyid cig kam dus gcig kam/ mtshan gcig kam/ skad cig ma gcig la/ phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis
308b8(mdo): rang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / theg pa chen po tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa la bsams pa/ gang zag de ni skad cig la se kol gtogs la
308b9(mdo): tsam gis kyi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams byed pa lnga dang / mnyam pa nyid la skur ba dang / kun das nyod mongs pa la las thams cad yongs su ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur ro// gal te dge slong ngam/ dge
309a1(mdo): slong la 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ sems kyi rang bzhin stor nas/ rtsa ba bzhi dang / sdom pa brgyad nyams pa dang / myi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams myed pa lnga byas pa dang / mnyam
309a2(mdo): ba nyid la bskur ba rnams/ phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan la dad pa skyed de/ phyag 'tshal na/ 'di lta bu'i las ngan pa kun ma lus pa 'byang bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' brtsald ma thag tu
309a3(mdo): sngon sangs rgyas 'od myi 'gyur gyi dus na/ rgyal bu dge mabor zhes bya ba de'i tshe/ myaM sum hor dang lhan cig tu skad cig ma der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos gdugs te phyag 'tshal nas/ tshig 'thun
309a4(mdo): bar bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag bskald pa grangs ma mchis pa nas/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las bgyis pa lta zhig bshad kyis myi rdzogs te/ myi dge ba bcu dang
309a5(mdo): mtshams ma mchis pa lnga dang / mnyam pa nyid la bskur ba'i sdig pa/ grangs ma mchis par bgyis pa/ de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdo/ sde bcu gnyis la rte nad nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dund
309a6(mdo): rnams kyi spu rer zol te/ 'gyod tshangs gsol zhing mchis na/ skabs dbye bar ci gnang zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu 'jigs pa'i sems skye ba 'ang
309a7(mdo): dka' la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'ang dka' ste/ myi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams myed pa rol zhing 'chags par 'dod pa ni/ log spyod las stsogs pa yang / sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid mthong du nye bas/ yid la
309a8(mdo): dra ba bzhin du zol zhing shod cig/ de nas rgyal bu dge mthor las stsogs pa/ myi sum hong kis bcom ldan 'das kyi skabs dbe' bar gnang ba/ byams pa'i gsung thos nas/ gos tshags bcos te/ thal lo/
309a9(mdo): sbyar cig phyag 'tshal nas/ bla gos phrag pa g.yas su ka zar te/ pus mo lha nga sa btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
309b1(mdo): la skyabs su la ci'o// phyogs bcu'i chos la rgyas sul tsa'o// phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun sa skyabs yu lachiso/ sa 'di lta te// nar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas zhug gyi mngal la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol so/
309b2(mdo): lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin cen 'thung gnas sa phyag 'jal zhing skyabs su gsal 'o/ rub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas 'od dpag mye sa phyag 'chas zhing skyabs su gsol mo// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas dor yor grub pa
309b3(mdo): la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ bla la phyogs kyi sangs rgyas dri brtsegs la phyag 'tshal zhing skye ba su gsol lo// 'og ma phyogs kyi sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan sa phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// yang ga
309b4(mdo): phyogs ma skyes bu chen po kun tu bzang po la phyag 'chas zhing skyabs mug mos so// sgo phyog pa da skyes bu chen po/ 'jig rten 'dzi sa phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// rub phyogs da skyes su
309b5(mdo): chen po kun tu spyan pa gzigs dbang thug sa phyag 'tshal 'a/ skyabs mu ga sos so// byang phyog par skyes bu chen po phra gapas byan/ 'chal zhing skyabs su gsol so// bra la phyogs nang skyes bu can po
309b6(mdo): dam ma kha'i snying po phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// 'og phyogs da skyes bu chen po 'jas dpasas yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol ya/ yang bdag cag gi mkhan po de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi 'gyum la phyag
309b7(mdo): 'ams zhing / skyabs su gsol lo// mabyon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid sa phyag mtshas ning skyabs su gsol so// phyogs gnad na sangs rgyas sprus pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// skyes su
309b8(mdo): chen po dri ma myed par grags dang / 'jam dpal gzhon du la yang phyag 'tshal zhing / skyabs su gsol lo// 'phags pa dga' bo dang / 'od srub la yang skyabs su gsol lo// 'phags pa'i 'bras bu rnam
309b9(mdo): bzhi mngon par 'byung ba rnams la yang skyabs su gsol lo// byang chub kyi sems dang po bskyed pa rnams la yang skyabs su gsol lo// sde sdod chen po gsungs rabs mdo lnga bcu gnyis dang / mnyam pa nyid dang
310a1(mdo): yang dag pa'i mdo sde gzhan bzhugs so// 'tshal la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// chu brgyad du ma'i sku gdung ring sre lang dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su
310a2(mdo): gsol lo// da ltar sku gzugs bzhugs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// phyogs bzhi'i rgyal lo tshar po bzhi dang / tshangs pa dang / brgya byi nad dang / sum bcurtsa gsus kyi lha'i dbang sdug
310a3(mdo): dang / bar snang na gnas pa'i lha dang / so'i lha dang / ri dang nags tshal dang / shing drung gyi lha dang / drang srong dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / ldan pa rnams dang lha'i l+yar mnga' ba dang / lha'i snyan mnga' ba
310a4(mdo): thams cad snyan gis gsan cing mkhyend par mdzod cig/ kun dbang du gsol da to// sems can thams cad la ma zol ma bshags pa zhig mchis na yang / sdig pa thams cad byang bar
310a5(mdo): gyur da cig/ yang de skad ces smras te/ bdag cag thog ma ma/ mchis pa nas/ da ltar gyi lus ngan pa 'di thob pa'i bar du nor ci 'khrul ba'i sems kyis phyin ci log tu lta ba dpag
310a6(mdo): tu ma mchis/ nyon mongs pa dang / myi dge ba'i las bgyis pa brjod kyis myi lang he/ sden che'i tshogs bgyis so 'tshal lo/ rang gi sa ma tshor ma rig pas/ ngan sems rab tu rgyas te/
310a7(mdo): tshe phyi ma mthong zhing / tshe 'di 'ba' shig mthong bas/ nyon mongs pa'i bag chags la mos te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ring du gyu rad cing / las dad pas bar du chod nas/ sdig pa'i grogs dang bste nad cing
310a8(mdo): dge slong dang / dge slong ma 'am/ myi rigs myi tshul ba'i las bgyis pa dang / pha dang ma la myi rigs myi tshul ba'i las bgyis pa dang / yang bdag rang nyams kyi dbang gyis/ dge 'dun gyi dkor nor

312a1(mdo): rtsa ba bzhi pham par gyur pa rnams ma bshags ma 'thol ma/ sems can dmyal bar nges par ltung te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos dang /
312a2(mdo): rang sangs rgyas kyis kyang / skyabs mdzad par myi 'gyur/ dge 'dun dang / pha ma dang / lha rnams dang / myi rnams kyis kyang skyabs dang / 'or bgyid myi nus so// zhes byung bas na/ de'i slad du deng 'jigs
312a3(mdo): shing skrag pa dpag tu ma mchis gnod zhing ngo tsha ba dpag tu ma mchis / de'i slad du deng dkon mchog gsum dang / 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rin cen mang dang / ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas hong dang / da ltar bzhugs
312a4(mdo): pa'i sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku shag kya thub pa la skyabs su gsol lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni byams pa dang / phyogs su s+ho mas pa'i yab yum lags/ byang chub sems dpa' dzas
312a5(mdo): dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na/ bdag cag bskas pa dpag/ tu ma mchis pa tshun cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa dang / pham pa bzhi dang
312a6(mdo): mtshams ma mchis pa dang / myi dge ba bcu las stsogs pa'i sdig lci ba rnams 'thol zhing bshakas par 'tshul na/ ka nang ba li skabs dbyed gsol// yang 'di lta he/ bcom
312a7(mdo): ldan 'das deng bdag cag gis sems cad rnams dang / bdag cag rang rang gi slad du// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i spyar sngar 'bol zhing bshags par 'tshal lo// sems can thams cad kyis bsgral pa
312a8(mdo): dpag tu ma mchis pa tshun chad/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / pha ma'i dri de glo ba ma chud pa rnams dang / rnam par byang ba'i chos ma 'tshal te/ myi dge ba sna tshogs bgyis pa dang / rang gi rigs
312a9(mdo): bsams te dregs shing rgyags pa'i tshe/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las nyam bag du bgyis kyang / dongs par ma mthong bas skye bo blun po'i las spyod pa dang / sdig pa'i bshes gnyen la sten cing / nyon
312b1(mdo): mongs pa'i sems zhugs pa dang / 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan lnga la cho ga ma 'tshal te/ myi dge ba'i las rnams bgyis pa dang / 'gro ba bzang mos bskus te/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / ka ti mug gnyod
312b2(mdo): mongs pas gzi ma cing sems zhugs te/ spros dang / lus dang ngag dang / yid gsum gyi sgo nas/ bstsags pa'i las kyi dge ba/ bdag rang kyis bgyis pa dang / gzhan bgyid du rtsal ba dang / bgyid pa la
312b3(mdo): rjes su yi rang ba de dag thams cad de so sor chags so// 'bol lo// myi 'chab bo// sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / 'phags pa'i dge 'dun da la bsnye dang bkur la bgyis pa yi sdig pa yang / de so so marbag+sa
312b4(mdo): so// 'phel lo// myi 'chab bo// byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas la yang bsnyen bkur ma mchis pa'i sdig pasadeng so so ma 'chags so// 'arol lo mya'i chab bo//
312b5(mdo): ma rig pa'i dbang gyis dam pa'i chos la bskur ba dang / pha ma dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang drin kyi glo bar ma chud pa'i / bsnye dang bkur ma bgyis pa'i sdig pa de dag kyang
312b6(mdo): deng so sor 'chags so// 'phel lo// myi 'chab bo// bru dang zhing rmongs pas bsgrib ste/ nyam rangs dang / rgyags pas kyi dge ba sna chog/ sa bgyis pa'i sdig pa de dag kyang deng so sor chags so/
312b7(mdo): 'thol lo// kyi 'chab bo// sra cad yang gyi bgyid do// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la bdag cag gis sod thus de mi chod pa pa ni/ ma sus pa'i sems cad de dag kun das bayul 'khod
312b8(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa dang bcol pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i rgya chub sum ngod par rdzogs pa rgyab gyur na/ dedapa bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyas bu dge sa la 'di ska kyis
312b9(mdo): te/ legs mi legs so// skyes bu chen po gyis mi sogs shes kum nas nyin mam ma'ams 'jigs pa dang / sgeg pa bskyed dam nyes pa rnams mdzad par 'thos pa
313a1(mdo): steng du/ sems can gyi sdig mang po yang khyod kyis 'thol zhing 'chags pa'i phyir/ khyod ni skyes bu dam pa yang dag pa zhes bya'o// rang gi nyon mongs 'ang spong ba'i ster du/ sems can ka kun nas nyon
313a2(mdo): mongs pa yang ring du dpral bar byas pas/ de'i phyir khyod ni skyes bu dam pa yang dag pa zhes bya ba yin te/ rang gi don tu smon pa yin gyi/ thog mar sems can thams cad kyi don tu/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzog
313a3(mdo): pa'i byang chub tu mngon bar rdzogs par 'tshang brgya bar smon da yam btab pa'i phyir/ khyod ni skyes bu dam pa yang dag pa/ skyes bu dam pa yang dag zhes bya'o// de nas rgyal bu dge mthong las stsogs pa gyi sum tor gyis
313a4(mdo): 'gyod tshangs bgyis pa'i 'og tu/ bcom ldan 'das tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces bstod do// bcom ldan nyag cig gtso zo'i ma chog/ khams gsum pa la thams cad mkhyed
313a5(mdo): thams cad kyi mnyam mnyam ba nyid/ bcom ldan dko na mchog lha phyag 'tshal lo// skye bo spya gtor rang kyi phyir/ dor rdzas byin cing lan yang re/ byams chen rgyal ba de phyir te
313a6(mdo): dgraganyen byams can snyoms mdzad/ rkang gnyis dpas rgya ba bcun/ shes rab spyad gis mkhyed gzig sa la/ na 'grus che la bdag skyabs mchil/ lha gzhan shes ra
313a7(mdo): de ma 'tshal/ 'das dang sa byod da ltar bzhugs/ rgyas bkund la bdag phyag 'tshal/ de bzhin rgyal ba skyabs gso ldad pa 'ang/ dus gsum rgyal ba mchod pa bzhin/ de das phyon sa bcu'i ya
313a8(mdo): rgyas rnams kyis rgyal bu dge mabong dang / myi gsum ho pa la tshigs su bcad de'aho dad pa/ gang zhig sangs rgyas 'grub 'dod pa/ mang du los la 'brang bar byos/ bslob dpon dge la bkur byas la/
313a9(mdo): sangs rgyas 'grub pa yun gyi ring / gang zhig tshul khrims nas dag byar/ de ni dge slong yang dag yin/ gang zhig hong par bsgom nus pa/ de ni ting 'dzin thob ces bya/ gang zhig brtson 'grus spyod
313b1(mdo): nus pa/ de'i byang chub spyod pa'o// gangazhig mya ngan 'das gyu da pa/ de ni dge bsang dag pam/ nus khrims cing 'dzin pa'i dge slong dang / ram dag khrims 'dzin dge grongs zla ba byed cilag pa ltung byar/
313b2(mdo): chos kos nas pa lus gyon to// sbu med seg shang logs nas bu// nam dag bsod snyoms 'gro byas na/ lha rnams kun kyang dka' 'thum pas/ rgyal po sbyar zhing kus phyag 'ams// ngas kyang lha dang phyi
313b3(mdo): kun de'i bya ba byed du gzhug/ dper na lha zan thams cad kyis/ lha yi dbang po brgya byin la/ rim 'gro gus par byed pa bzhin// da ltar 'phral du 'ang lan thob po// phyi ba'i dus su'ang dpag du byed/ rab tu thu
313b4(mdo): de rnams 'dzi' pangs rgyas rjod lan sngo rgyas das pa dpa' la / 'jig rten pa'i phyi kun kyang / nas dag dad pa
313b5(mdo): bskyed do// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag kun/ mya ngan gyi'o/ da rtag tu 'junapa rlom dang dge 'dun de bzhin te/ na par shes pa ni/ sangs rgyamarnam la ldan nas
313b6(mdo): rgyal bu dge ma thong 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten po'i myi dag kun rnam par 'byed pa'i sems myed cing / theg pa cig lam mngon par shes/ 'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs pa/ phyogs bcu dang ni ngalta
313b7(mdo): rnams/ sangs rgyas pa ga sen cig pu la gnyis sam gsum zhes bya byed par/ de ltar yid la bskyed nas su/ sems kyis rnam par gyi rtog gi/ de lta bu'i mying rnams ni/ rgyal ba'i drin lan ldon zhes
313b8(mdo): rgyal bu dge ma thong 'di lta ste/ gang zag la la 'ga' zhig gis/ sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das kyi sartag tu dad pa'i sems bskyed de/ sems cad kun la sangs rgyas kyi/ bdag nyid yod par bshad pan
313b9(mdo): de lta bu'i gang zag rnams rgyal ba'i drin lan sngon zhes bya/ gang zhig skad cig dge myong ci / lha'i 'bras bu rgyal he/ chog car za da myed las bsgrubs pa rgyal ba'i dri lan ldod zhes bya/ rgyal
314a1(mdo): su dge mthong 'di sa te/ dus rgyam ma dran 'das kyis/ gas te gang bag 'ga' zhig gse/ yung sa ma mdze lnga 'di grangs te/ dkor mchog gsum la sum byas shing / ma'as la sri ba cu mtshad
314a2(mdo): ra/ de lta bu'i gang zag rnams rgyal ba'i rje pa sngon zhes byagang zhig nor rdzas lnga 'aka' 'a5/ khe bas dang nigos kIn sa swA/ kun la khyab par smin byas na/ rgyal ba 'dzi san sngon zhes bya/ rgyas bu
314a3(mdo): mthong 'di ste he/ nga'i chos rnams 'jig pa na/ gang zhig 'gal la blo ba ha na nas/ yud tsam mdo sde 'di mnyan ra/ byang chub sems dpa' 'bum brgya lo/ mchod pa phul bas de lhag ko/ theg chen mdo sde 'di
314a4(mdo): ngag kyang / sangs rgyas byang chub kun gyi yum/ sangs rgyas byung chub sems dpal dang / mdo sde 'di la dran byas te/ snyoms sem sa pa mtshun gnyis myed ma/ rgyal ba'i drin lan sngon zhes bya
314a5(mdo): rgyal bu dge la 'ong 'di lta te/ gang zhig chos 'di 'dzind pa'i tshe/ rgyal ba'i drin lam zan 'dod pas/ skad cig sud tsam skom byed ba ho 'ams gang ba'i sems can gi/ srog gi spyon
314a6(mdo): ba byed pas/ bsam gtan sgom pa yon tan me/ gang nig skom la bskum ba dang / dge 'dun 'khrugs par byed pa na/ nyong 'am sa gsum po gang ba'i/ phyi rnams kyis srog bcad dang / dron
314a7(mdo): chags thams cad bsad dang 'dra/ de sdig yab de de bzhin do// kang zhig dge sbyong bya// bskur ba bdems shing ma dang pa/ dkon mchog gsum kyi rigs gcod pas/ de'i rgyas pa'i san gyi ljon// den sa
314a8(mdo): rgyal bu dge mthong dang / kyi sum hor po// bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis baha ra de pa kan pa ba/ dka' bas tshis nas bstan pa nyid kyi 'os blangs ha/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
314a9(mdo): 'das kyi nyam / gapa yang lags ga ga kyi mad/ mad dang mis ga kyis nga/ dngam lam kyigs su la lam dag pa 'dis Ta/ sa rnams lun
314b1(mdo): can sa byams sangs/ sa rgyas sa nga/ pags bad / ca sa gzhanas du cad/ pa dgas can bye mis gde bzhi gshegs pa 'ang de ban
314b2(mdo): kun gyi sdig ra// de bzhin gshegs pa / de'i zangasu de ba gan sa bzod pa'i gas btan pa'i / za ba'i gzu stoms brtson 'grus
314b3(mdo): na ba'i mad 'di shes rab lasogs/ le mo'i ngam rnams 'joms ya da cing / 'jig rten lha dang byin mas rgya// mchod yon thul bshes pas ma de'i slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan/ dgra bcom pa zhes 'gyi ba lags
314b4(mdo): rabang tu sdug bsngal mtshan nyid ma khyerang/ sdug bsngal rgyal ba shin ma bye nga/ sdug bsngam na pa'i mtshan nyid la/ zhi ba'i tshul ya ra dus bye dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa'i mkhyedad pas ya/ 'phrur
314b5(mdo): ba ya mchis bden par des / de bas phyog sa bcu yin pa yang mtshan mi la ba dag rdzogs shes bgyi / rig pa gsul po mchog bzhes pas/ gyod lam nam dag dang yang ldan de grang sa sa
314b6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das// rkyen dang 'a thas su ldan 'am / las 'bus pa dbus byed cing / dmasam nyid rnams pa bun sa byams sangs/ dus skabs ma
314b7(mdo): kyim bshad/ kye rgan 'di pa bral cing / bde ba'i gnas sa phyin pa mdang / so slang du rgyal pa dzad/ 'dre ba gshegs pagyis kyi sana'ajig rten gang dam mchis pa dang / 'jig rten
314b8(mdo): pa'i mtha' yas mkhyedang/ de'i slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan/ 'jig rten mkhyen ces bgyi ba lags/ thugs rje chen pos sems can bsgral/ mnyen des dge ba ba ha dad cing btul/ de'i slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan
314b9(mdo): skyes su 'dul ba la yo sgyur/ tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab spyas/ thub pa'i bla yu 'dal 'byed// de'i srad du rgyal ba'i mtshan/ bra da byed ces bgyi ba lags/ nyon mongs kyi she she rab ldan/ nam gro
315a1(mdo): dam pa mchog bshad pas/ de'i slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan/ lha dang myi'i hon ces bgyi/ dus gsum g.yo 'am myi g.yob bas sam ma bas chos kun kyang / byang chub shing drung kun mkhyen pas
315a2(mdo): de'i slad du mtshan sangs rgyas de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams/ rdzu 'phrul chen po'i ting 'dzin du zhugs nas/ sku nam mkha' la 'phags te/ zhal so so nas tshig mthun par 'di skad ces bka' stsa lad to//
315a3(mdo): rgyal bu dge mthong dang / myi sum stong po khyed rnams kyi sdig gi rang bzhin ni// nang na'ang myi gnas/ phyi rol na yang myi gnas/ bar na yang myi gnas so// sems brtan pa'i phyir/ dge ba'i mthu yang myi brtan to// sos
315a4(mdo): rnam par grol ba'i phyir/ sdig pa'i rang bzhin yang rnam par grol lo// shes rab stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sdig gi rang bzhin yang tong pa nyid do// dad pa'i mthu che ba'i phyir/ bsod nams kyi mthu yang che// de bzhin
315a5(mdo): du mtho la bshad te/ 'gyod tshangs su nus pa ni/ nged rnams mthongaba'i steng du/ sangs rgyas rin cen mang dang / spruld pa'i sku thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'gyod tshangs kyis sdig sbyangs pas/
315a6(mdo): rgyun tu nga yang mthong la deng byang chub sems dpa' rnamasra bstan bcos pa dang 'dra bas/ de bzhin du 'gyod tshangs byas pa ni/ nga dang spru lad pa rnams da // 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rin ce na ma pa las stsogs pa thams cad kya/
315a7(mdo): dgos par 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu dus gsum gi sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / mchod pa byas par 'gyur te/ de dag kyang dgyes par 'gyur te/ theg pa chen po'i mdo sde 'di'o rjes su byang chub tu chud par 'gyur ro//
315a8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor na 'bring ba rnams la bka' brtsal pa/ sdig can rnams kyis sdig bshags par 'dod da/ rgyal bu dge ma bong bzhini ru/ dus gsum gi sangs rgyas dang mdo sde bcu gnyis dang byang chub
315a9(mdo): sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po rnams la/ re re nas dmyigs de phyag 'tshal ba da dang zad par 'dra ba 'am/ mthong ba dang 'dra bar 'du shes bskyed de/ sangs rgyas cig gas/ sangs rgyas gnyim sa pa

316a5(mdo): bal yin no// byang chub sems dpal la las don dam pa'i bden ba khong du chud pa yang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yin no// byang chub sems dpa' la las dpa' bar
316a6(mdo): 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yin no// byang chub sems dpa' la las nam mkha'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yang / dus gsum sangs

316a9(mdo): chub sems dpal la las seng ge'i sgra'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje 'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes lha'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yang / dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal pa los ra/
316b1(mdo): byang chub sems dpal mams mnyam pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / bra ra byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dpyod las dang ldan pa yang / dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs
316b2(mdo): rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po chos kyi rje 'jam dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad dor tsas

316b9(mdo): la 'khrug sems gsal zhing / dra pa yang dag pa dang / bsam pa yang dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa la sems cig du bsam yo/ de ltar pyod pa rnams mthur zhing 'dum pa di mchog ste/ de la myi mthun

317b9(mdo): bcom ldan 'das log 'di ltar bgyi ba'i che/ myi ma pan rung ngam/ nyung na rung / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka la saN+Dal pa/ myi chog yan chad nyi shu man chad rung ngo // cho ga 'di myod pa'i tshe mdo gzhan yi bas ma yo
318a1(mdo): // de ltar 'bol tshangs bgyis pa'i 'og tu phyin cad nye gyi byed na/ de mi 'bol tshangs shes bya'o// de ltar dran par gyis shig/ bdag cag rnams da lhur 'chi ba las su sa 'tsho ba dang 'dra bas/ da ni bdag yul khrims
318a2(mdo): bsrung ngo // da ni bdag brtson 'grus spyad do// de ri bdag theg pa chen po'i mdo sde klog pa dang / 'a dor bgyi'o zhes de'i tshe de'i dus na dra ba de ltar gyis shig bdag deng ras sdom pa bzung ba ni/ rdo rje 'dra bar srad bub par
318a3(mdo): smonang to// des de ltar dran pa'i tshe/ skyes bu dam pa dri ma myed par grags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu myed pa dang / lhan cig tu de'i mdun du 'greb/ 'bar du byed do// 'phags pa kun tu bzang po yang
318a4(mdo): 'gyod tshangs kyi mkhan po byed do// 'phags pa 'od srung yang zhug/ nas kyi rten byed do// 'jam dpal 'di ni sdog pa sbyangs pa zhes bya'o// 'di rnam par klog pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes
318a5(mdo): bya'o// 'di ni ga nas thob pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi/ sa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gang la la zhig gis rtsa ba bzhi

319a2(mdo): grangs myed pa zhig yod de/ rgyal mtshan gi mgor mye 'byung ba ni chu myig 'byung ba dang 'dra bar 'byung / lcags 'ju ba'i zhu ba 'bab pa yi/ kun du khyab par bab ste dmyal ba'i sgo bzhir sgo re re'i he na zangs po
319a3(mdo): bco brgyad yod pa'i nang na lcags zhol ba'i zhu ba khar yud cing sgo bzhir bab pa/ dmyal ba'i nang du gang bar 'bab bo// khang pa bar chad re re'i nad na yang lcags kyi sprul chen po brgyad khri bzhi hor yo pas/ khar 'jug/

319a6(mdo): re'i phyi rol tu 'bar po'i mye shin tu mched cing 'bar ba lho byang shar nub skor zhing phyed par rgyu'o// 'bar ba yang lcags kyi ra ba 'khor yug dpag tshad brgyad khri nas hod lcags kyi ra ba la thug gi bar du ya ra thal/ mar
